story:
Emily Jones (namineahtellai) of Pegasister's Live needs our help! she has been trying to pay for some dental procedures, but her insurance can't cover for her.


If you donate now only a little, you'll help promise that she won't face any dangers and she will continue to have a beautiful smile.

story:
Short Summary

I'm just a person disgusted by the actions of Ferguson, St. Louis and Missouri State Police in attacking peaceful protesters with tear gas who'd like to provide protesters with gas masks to allow them to continue excersizing their 1st Amendment rights.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We will need about $20,000 to order 200 of these gasmasks and pay for shipping costs.
  • Unique perks? You get to defend the constitution.
  • If we don't reach the goal all funds will be donated to the ACLU of Eastern Missouri

We will need about $20,000 to order 200 of these gasmasks and pay for shipping costs. Unique perks? You get to defend the constitution. If we don't reach the goal all funds will be donated to the ACLU of Eastern Missouri

story:
Hi!

My name is Eostar Kamala and I am Merina/Marylee's close friend.   Since Merina told me about her diagnosIs of colon cancer I have tried everything in my power to help her out in her quest for recovery. Right now I am working on orchestrating a fundraiser music event at Jackson Wellsprings (on the 7th of June) in Ashland and I am also jumpstarting this on-line campaign so Merina would have the necessary funds to budget with in her quest for healing using both natural and western healing modalities. Please find out more information about our fundraiser concert on Facebook here: https://www.facebook.com/events/470248053053236/

Merina/Marylee has currently opted to to use several different types of treatments including surgery as well as natural methods of healing.  While she chose to have the tumor surgically removed, natural healing practices and herbal remedies/ supplements will be part of her recovery program.  She needs your help to be able to cover these expenses.  Merina will also need a lot of rest which requires a period of time during which she cannot work and earn a living. 

I know that we all have our own health issues and our own limited budget but when a dear friend is diagnosed with a life-threatening illness, the community will pull together and nurture the person so needing healing.  So I would like to invite you to be part of Merina's community of friends: fellow spiritual seekers, artists, neighbors, family members or however else you are connected!  Please donate to this wonderful woman who is not only a selfless mom but also a great visionary artist who has created so much mystical beauty to share with others!  

Remeber that someone else's request for help is an invitation to practice selfless service and as such is a true blessing!

About our "perks": Those of you offering smaller amounts will be rewarded by small "perks" such as a devotional music CD from me and art cards from Merina!  Those of you contributing in a more substantial way will also receive some of Merina's hauntingly beautiful and joyfully mystical art pieces!  To see these please visit the media gallery of this fundraiser and match the titles of the art pieces with the titles of the "perks".  You can go to my website (www.eostar.net) to hear the CD "Rose and Lotus".

To all of you - including those who can only afford to help through prayers or showing up to help around Merina's house -  we are eternally grateful!

All funds raised on this site will go directly to Merina/Marylee's bank account and will be used to pay healthcare professionals in the naturopathic medicine field and to fund the recovery process after surgery.  Our goal is to raise $25000 but if she does not meet that goal, she will still get whatever amount was raised.

If you cannot help with money at this time, there are still other ways you can help:

-sharing this indie gogo campaign with your friends who might be able to contribute

-bringing an item for the silent auction of the fundraiser concert (on the 7th of June) see event on Facebook here: https://www.facebook.com/events/470248053053236/

- coming to her house and helping Merina with shopping for fresh vegetables, juicing and preparing raw foods

-volunteering to bring fresh vegetables to her house from your garden

-attend our fundraiser concert at Jackson Wellsprings (on th 7the of June) and spread the word about it https://www.facebook.com/events/470248053053236/ 

- energy work, body work, any other healing modalities or products

- PRAYERS

- anything else that you think could be of help Merina in her healing quest

Eternal gratitude to all of you. Blessings, Love and Light - Eostar Kamala (www.eostar.net)

story:
How's awful it feels like when you cannot sleep easily and deeply? Spent the night tossing and turning — how you’ll feel the next day? Tired, cranky, and out of sorts. Let’s Banala help you out.

Banala is a patented bedside Alarm Clock integrated with Isochronic Sound technology to put you to the best sleep ever, every night.

Several studies have proven the incredible benefits of Isochronic Tone. Although they are well-known in the medical community, they are not as widespread among the rest of society. We decided to bring the benefits to your sleep journey. It’s a natural and effective way to improve sleep and well-being.

This is the best Alarm Clock yet to put you to sleep and wake you up with a brand new you!

Banala will take you to the new level of sleep journey from the very beginning through the wake-up.

 
 

Isochronic Tones

Improving Sleep and for Power Napping – When you're struggling to get to sleep, it's very likely that your brain is producing too much beta activity.  Banala with Isochronic Tone technology can be used to reduce beta activity and increase more in the low delta and theta frequency range.  Helping you get to sleep faster and deeper.

Brainwave Frequencies for Better Sleep

Brainwave speed is measured in Hertz (Hz) and relates to how many times they cycle per second.  A 5Hz brainwave simply means that it is cycling at a rate of 5 times per second.

Our brainwave activity reflects how we are feeling and what we are doing. If slower brainwaves are dominant we can feel sleepy, very relaxed or dreamy.

With brainwave entrainment methods like isochronic tones, they are used to stimulate and produce more brainwave activity of a specific frequency or range, making that more dominant. Which make Banala effectively put you to the best sleep. You could seek to reduce high brain wave frequency by listening to slower speed isochronic tones, which would help calm your mind and bring down your stress levels. 

Delta Waves

0.2Hz-3Hz – Delta waves are very slow and low in frequency. You produce the most delta activity during your deepest sleep. It's during delta that your body does most of it's healing and regenerating of cells.

Theta Waves 

3Hz to 8Hz – Theta waves are also mainly dominant during sleep, or in a state of deep relaxation or when we are drifting in and out of sleep.  

 

 

1. Happier. Sleeping poorly ruins your day. You know that, but researchers have shown it too, especially in one notable study that followed 909 working women. A poor night's rest affected their happiness as much as tight work deadlines, and it had an even bigger impact on mood than significant income differences in the group.

2. Better sex. Not getting enough sleep lowers libido and can make people more likely to have sexual problems like erectile dysfunction. And sleep itself is restorative — it increases testosterone levels, which boosts sexual drive for both men and women.

3. Build muscle more easily. There's a reason that fitness magazines and forums always focus on the importance of sleep. If you don't sleep, you can't build muscle. Your body uses most of the night (except when you are in REM sleep) to heal damage done to your cells and tissues when you are awake and more metabolically active. At the start of the night and during slow wave sleep, your body also releases growth hormone. Lack of sleep, on the other hand, is linked to muscle atrophy.

4. Learn better. This isn't just about kids. Adults who get enough sleep do better on tests of short-term memory. And when researchers had adults do a task once, get a good night's sleep, and then try the task again, they showed improvement. But participants who stayed awake 30 hours after learning the same task had a much harder time improving their skills — even if they practiced and had a chance to catch some recovery shut eye later. Something about the initial sleep deprivation impaired their ability to learn. Of course, letting kids get enough sleep is important too. In one case, starting schools an hour later (at 8:30 instead of 7:30) increased "standardized test scores by at least 2 percentile points in math and 1 percentile point in reading." The Minneapolis school district found that starting school an hour and a half later (7:15 to 8:40) improved attendance and led to fewer symptoms of depression among students.

5. Better and safer driver. Driving sleepy is like driving drunk. Both are a common cause of serious injuries and in tests, sleep-deprived drivers perform like alcohol-impaired drivers. Drowsy driving is responsible for 100,000 crashes and 1,500 deaths every year, according to the National Sleep Foundation. Almost 20% of serious injuries in crashes happen when there's a sleepy driver involved.

6. One of the best ways to stay fit. Multiple studies show that people who sleep less are more likely to be obese. One study that followed 500 people for 13 years found that people who regularly slept less than seven hours a night were 7.5 times more likely to be overweight — even after controlling for physical activity, family history, and demographic factors. Researchers think this is mostly due to hormonal changes caused by sleep deprivation — not getting enough sleep stimulates your appetite. Basically, one of the most effective diet hacks possible is just getting enough sleep.

7. People who don't sleep enough are more likely to develop diabetes — even if they are skinny. Type 2 diabetes is an awful disease that can lead to strokes, amputations, blindness, and organ damage. And this isn't just about obesity, so if you are skinny but don't get enough sleep this still applies. Otherwise healthy adults lose their ability to control blood sugar without getting enough sleep, and the less sleep someone gets, the more likely they are to develop a problem. Compared to adults who sleep seven to eight hours a night, people who sleep six hours are 1.7 times as likely to develop diabetes, and people who sleep five hours are 2.5 times as likely to develop diabetes.

8. Better moods and fewer problems with depression and anxiety. People who sleep less tend to have more symptoms of depression, lower self esteem, and more anxiety — though that's an association and it's possible that those symptoms cause people to sleep less. Still, a review of studies shows that sleep loss has an even stronger effect on mood than it does on cognitive ability or motor function, which is a strong indicator that sleeping more could help.

9. Healthier skin. Along with mood disorders, sleeping poorly is also associated with chronic skin conditions. Some research shows that poor sleep, depression, anxiety, and chronic skin problems all go together. A study published in Clinical and Experimental Dermatology found that "good sleepers" recovered better after ultraviolet light exposure, and their skin also recovered more quickly after having tape stripped off of it. They also showed fewer signs of aging.

10. Less likely to make risky financial decisions. When people are tired, the way they make financial decisions changes. Instead of trying to minimize loss, they start looking for risky big gains. That's a good reason to make sure you sleep before making any big purchases — and it also raises some questions about the insane hours some Wall Street employees log. 11. Less time and money at the doctor. People who score high on a "sleepiness scale" use 11% more healthcare resources than their well-rested brethren. Sleep troubles caused by sleep apnea and insomnia cost the US billions of dollars in direct medical costs every year, and that's even before taking into account the associated lost productivity.

11. Adolescents who sleep enough are less likely to abuse alcohol. According to the Institute of Medicine, sleep problems are associated with alcohol abuse. Adolescents who have sleeping problems are more likely to develop problems abusing alcohol — though it's also true that people who abuse alcohol have trouble sleeping well. Still, researchers believe that having a disrupted circadian rhythm causes changes in the reward system of the brain. This, in turn, makes those adolescents more likely to engage in risky behavior and to develop alcohol use disorders.

12. Easier to speak well. We know that people who drive tired are similar to those who drive drunk, but did you know that staying awake too long can cause slurred speech, repetitive word usage, and a slow, monotonous tone? So make sure to get some rest before your next presentation.

13. Prevent migraines and other headaches. If you find yourself cringing due to sudden head pain, look at your sleep schedule. Even though doctors aren't sure exactly why this happens, multiple studies show that people who don't sleep enough are more likely to suffer migraines. "Poor sleep quality is uniquely associated with episodic migraine," write the authors of one recent study (emphasis ours). Additionally, 36 to 58% of sleep apnea sufferers wake up with a throbbing head.

14. More productive at work and more focused at home. The more tired you are, the harder it to concentrate on something, and distraction can take a toll on both work and your personal life. Researchers say that "attention tasks appear to be particularly sensitive to sleep loss." So if you want to focus — either on a job or a conversation — make sure to get some rest.

15. Make fewer dangerous mistakes. Though we don't always recognize it, we make more mistakes when we don't get enough sleep. For some of us that amounts to a typo here and there, which is annoying to our editors, but such carelessness can be more serious.

In 2003, the body that regulates medical residents' hours decided to limit those hours to 80 hours a week with no shifts longer than 24 hours (there's a reason why medical residents show up frequently in sleep deprivation studies). But a Harvard study afterwards found that if those hours were further reduced to 63 a week, residents slept more and made fewer serious medical errors. The more sleep-deprived group made 22% more serious errors. Famous accidents like the Space Shuttle Challenger explosion and the Exxon Valdez oil spill have been attributed, at least in part, to mistakes made by people who didn't get enough sleep. But it's not just these major events: All sleep-deprived workers are much more likely to have a dangerous accident. One study of 50,000 people in Sweden found that lack of sleep made people twice as likely to die in an accident.

16. See better We don't function well without sleep. Our bodies get tired and our eyes get tired. The longer you stay awake, the more vision errors you make, ranging from tunnel vision to seeing double to even — eventually, at scary levels of sleep loss — hallucinations.

17. Less likely to catch a cold. While going out in the cold doesn't make you more likely to catch one, being exposed to one does. But if you haven't slept before being exposed to a virus, your weakened immune system makes you much more likely to catch it. When researchers exposed a group of 153 people to the common cold, those who had been sleeping less than seven hours a night were almost three times more likely to catch the virus.

18. Less likely to develop certain kinds of cancer. People who do shift work (night shifts) and have disrupted circadian cycles — and thus don't sleep enough — are likely to encounter some serious health problems. One association that researchers have found is that these night workers are more likely to develop colon and breast cancer.

19. Less easily irritated or upset. When you don't sleep enough you're more emotionally volatile and more easily irritated — a little thing can make you blow up or ruin your morning even more. According to a study published by an Israeli research team, sleep deprivation amplifies negative emotions caused by small things like interruptions. The researchers studied medical residents, who as we know are tragically familiar with not getting enough sleep.

20. Feel less pain after a good night of sleep. Not getting enough sleep makes people more sensitive to pain — which can lead to a terrible cycle for chronic pain sufferers. Tests show that keeping people up all night makes it easier for them to feel pain. There's even evidence that not getting enough sleep can interfere with the pain relief processes of certain drugs. By the same token, getting good sleep can function like low level pain medication.

21. Better reactions. Researchers have tested college athletes and West Point cadets— pretty fit groups with pretty well-honed reactions in the first place. Overall strength isn't necessarily affected by losing a night's sleep, but after one sleep-deprived night people's reactions aren't as quick. The researchers theorize this is probably caused by a diminished ability to use information to make decisions.

22. Fewer heart problems. One large study found that sleeping five hours or less a night was associated with a 45% increased risk for heart attacks. Keeping people awake increases their blood pressure — even healthy young men who have one bad night of only 3.6 hours of sleep show significant temporary changes.

 

 

 

Banala Life is a company dedicated to helping people all over the world sleep better. Based on extensive and insightful research, we offer solutions that improve the well-being of users. Our mission is to defeat insomnia once and for all.   We have poured our hearts, minds, and weekends into this project because deep down we believe that once you use Banala you will have the better sleep which will bring you the better life. We hope you join us on this journey and make your sleep the supreme sleep journey.

Our trusted manufacturing partner are ready to run the production. With your help, we can secure enough orders to start production of the first batch and bring Banala to you.

If you would like to reach us, feel free to email us at " banala @ banala.life ". We would love to hear from you! Thank you!

Keeping people awake increases their blood pressure — even healthy young men who have one bad night of only 3.6 hours of sleep show significant temporary changes.   Banala Life is a company dedicated to helping people all over the world sleep better. Based on extensive and insightful research, we offer solutions that improve the well-being of users. Our mission is to defeat insomnia once and for all.   We have poured our hearts, minds, and weekends into this project because deep down we believe that once you use Banala you will have the better sleep which will bring you the better life. We hope you join us on this journey and make your sleep the supreme sleep journey.Our trusted manufacturing partner are ready to run the production. With your help, we can secure enough orders to start production of the first batch and bring Banala to you.If you would like to reach us, feel free to email us at " banala @ banala.life ". We would love to hear from you! Thank you!

story:
Video English Version 

Facebook Page

English version

--------------------------

Versione in Italiano


Who we are?

Lino Donadio and Mariano Peluso are two senior employees, very attentive to environmental issues. Lino is a Computer Engineer with a strong experience in Software Architectures, Embedded Systems and Telecommunication Networks; Mariano is a senior Geologist, informed and actively involved in the environmental discussions, with the passion for innovative technologies. 

Our dream is to contribute to the discussion about the air quality, with an useful idea.


What is SmartNoseDust?

SmartNoseDust is an electronic nose that measures the concentration of fine particles and pollutants in the air, communicating it in real time, via smartphone, to a web portal. SmatNoseDust measures the following particles:

· Coarse Particulate Matter (PM10)

· Particulate Matter (PM2.5)

· Carbon Monoxide (CO)

· Ozone (O3)

The idea for SmartNoseDust happened during our holidays 2 years ago. We began to observe the impact of the air quality on the health of our children, then we started comparing what happens in the city, in the mountains and near the sea.

Hence, the need of an in-depth investigation on how to realize a hands-on tool for people, in order to evaluate and share transparently, the quality of the air in the urban and outer-urban areas.

During this year we have created the first prototype of the electric nose, the iPhone App and the web portal, completely funded with our own resources.

From beginning of October, we have been working parallel with the first campaign of Particulate Matter (PM10) measurement in Campania, Tuscany and Abruzzo. The first results were very encouraging: we have compared our collected data with professional instrumentation (more complex and expensive), which resulted more-less the same...

With a detector device positioned in areas at risk, the detector could control not only the quality of the air but in the case of fire or smoke would send a text message  to the nearest Fire Brigade for an immediate intervention to put out the fire and in the case of arson the same text would be sent to the local Police station giving the possibility to catch the villains.

In Italy the quality of the air is controlled by a regional body ARPAC, they have only 19 of their own extremely expensive detectors over the whole of this region, which means in an area between a large city like Naples and Accerra, for example  the town of Casoria, the calculation of quality is measured by adding together the data from Naples and Accerra, then dividing by two. Not a very accurate or scientific result.

The SmartNoseDust website www.smartnosedust.com and the its relative Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/smartnosedust , are currently having a great success: for this reason we argue that now we are on the right track to create something useful for the whole community ...


What We Need?

The SmartNoseDust funding campaign is needed to cover two main aspects of our project:

• Industrialize the SmartNoseDust full kit, the complete tool for PM10, PM2.5, Ozone and CO measurement.

• Create a first prototype network to monitor critical urban and outer-urban areas (e.g. "Terra dei Fuochi")

We have estimated that, approximately 70.000 Euros of funding will be necessary. In the case we don't reach our funding target, we are convinced about striving  ahead.

Our argument is: the prevention of diseases, deriving from poor air quality, is a problem that should not be underestimated: we are ready, if necessary, to get back in the game with other initiatives.. 

A plethora of perks are waiting for you!!

We start with the citation as contributor on the SmartNoseDust site, passing to the SmartNoseDust T-Shirt gadget, up to the possibility to get your hands on different versions of the SmartNoseDust tool.

Air quality information can be also used as a technology enabler to make decisions on urban and outer-urban areas intervention: in this way, we can prepare and collaborate with Business partners, in order to share the SmartNoseDust Application Programming Interface (S-API).


What's the impact of the SmartNoseDust?

SmartNoseDust is a disruptive idea that puts in your hands a tool to participate, continuously, in the discussion regarding the quality of the air you breathe...

SmartNoseDust is the first social application conceived to measure and share information about Particulate Matter, Ozone and Carbon Monoxide concentration in the air.

SmartNoseDust can measure and share data both in combination with a smartphone (Apple/Samsung, etc.) or in standalone mode, via a GSM channel. This means that can be used in a twofold mode: as a portable measurement tool, to measure and share information about air quality, or as fixed tool, acting as sentry for urban and outer-urban areas.

With this project we are creating a new dimension, that is the knowledge of knowing what we breathe...

We're just at the beginning.... and with the same techniques, we can start to learn about everything that surrounds us (e.g. electromagnetic radiation, water quality, food quality and so on...)


How to help us?

Funding our idea… and …making noise about the SmartNoseDust campaign, using social networks and the Indiegogo share tools!!


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Chi siamo ?

Lino Donadio è un Ingegnere Informatico con una forte esperienza in architetture software, reti di telecomunicazioni e sistemi embedded. 

Mariano Peluso è un geologo, informato e coinvolto attivamente nelle discussioni sulle problematiche ambientali locali e nazionali, con la passione per le tecnologie innovative.

Il nostro sogno è quello di contribuire attivamente nella prevenzione delle malattie causate dall'inquinamento dell'aria, presentando una soluzione a nostro avviso molto utile per la comunità..

Che cosa è SmartNoseDust ?

SmartNoseDust è un naso elettronico che misura la concentrazione di polveri sottili e sostanze inquinanti presenti nell'aria, comunicandola in tempo reale, via smartphone, WiFi o GSM, ad un portale web. SmatNoseDust misura i seguenti inquinanti:

· Particolato grossolano ( PM10 )

· Particolato fine ( PM2.5 )

· Monossido di carbonio (CO)

· Ozono ( O3 )

L'idea SmartNoseDust è nata durante le nostre vacanze, a fine agosto 2011, osservando l'impatto della qualità dell'aria sulla salute dei nostri figli, confrontando ciò che accade in città, in montagna e vicino al mare.

Da qui, la necessità di approfondire ed indagare su come realizzare una "sentinella" da mettere nelle mani del cittadino, concepita per conoscere e condividere le informazioni sulla qualità dell'aria delle aree urbane ed extraurbane.

I nostri primi successi …

Nel corso di quest'anno abbiamo creato il primo prototipo del naso elettronico, una applicazione per iPhone ed il portale web, finanziandoci con risorse proprie.

A partire dall'inizio del mese di ottobre, abbiamo lanciato la prima campagna di misurazione del particolato grossolano (PM10) in Campania, Toscana ed Abruzzo. 

I primi risultati, da ritenersi più che incoraggianti, dimostrano pienamente le nostre teorie sulla mappatura dell'inquinamento cittadino.

Una serie di analisi comparative, effettuate con attrezzature più sofisticate e costose, hanno confermato la bontà dello SmartNoseDust e delle tecniche sviluppate nel corso di questi mesi.

Osservando anche il successo del sito www.smartnosedust.com e della relativa pagina Facebook.SmartNoseDust, crediamo di essere sulla buona strada per la creazione di qualcosa di veramente utile per l'intera comunità ...

Cosa ci serve ?

La campagna di crowfounding dello SmartNoseDust è necessaria per coprire due aspetti principali del nostro progetto:

• industrializzare il kit SmartNoseDust, creando una stazione di misura completa e portatile per la misura di PM10, PM2.5, Ozono e CO, funzionante in modalità Bluetooth, WiFi o GSM.

• Creare la prima rete di monitoraggio ambientale al mondo "low cost", al fine di controllare le aree urbane ed extraurbane critiche (ad esempio la "Terra dei Fuochi " )

Per sostenere questo primo passo, abbiamo stimato un founding di 70.000 euro. 

Nel caso non dovessimo raggiungere l'obiettivo, siamo decisi nel continuare a credere in questo progetto, eventualmente implementando ulteriori passi intermedi. 

Noi sosteniamo che la prevenzione delle malattie derivanti da una cattiva qualità dell'aria è un problema che non va sottovalutato: siamo pronti, se necessario, a rimetterci in gioco con nuove iniziative.

Abbiamo selezionato per i nostri sostenitori una plètora di benefici ed accessori molto interessanti..

Si parte dalla citazione come sostenitore dell'iniziativa sul sito SmartNoseDust, fino alla possibilità di avere nelle proprie mani una delle diverse versioni del naso elettronico.

Le informazioni sulla qualità dell'aria, possono essere utilizzate anche come tecnologia abilitante per prendere decisioni in materia di intervento su aree urbane ed extraurbane. 

Pertanto siamo pronti anche a cooperare condividendo la SmartNoseDust Application Programming Interface (SND-API) che permette di prelevare dal nostro database le misure correnti e storiche sulla qualità dell'aria, opportunamente georeferenziate.

L'impatto dello SmartNoseDust

SmartNoseDust è una idea dirompente che mette nelle nostre mani uno strumento di partecipazione attiva sulla discussione della qualità dell'aria che respiriamo..

SmartNoseDust è la prima applicazione sociale concepita per misurare e condividere informazioni su particolato, ozono e concentrazione di monossido di carbonio nell'aria .

SmartNoseDust può misurare e condividere i dati, sia in combinazione con uno smartphone (Apple/Samsung , etc ) che in modalità autonoma, attraverso un canale WiFi o GSM. 

Questo significa che la sua funzione è duplice: può essere usato come strumento di misura portatile, o come strumento fisso, in qualità di sentinella elettronica di aree urbane ed extraurbane

Con SmartNoseDust abbiamo creato una nuova dimensione, fatta di prevenzione, basata sulla conoscenza e condivisione di informazioni vitali …

E siamo solo all'inizio....

Come aiutarci ?

Investite sulla nostra idea... e ... fate rumore sulla campagna SmartNoseDust, utilizzando i social network e gli strumenti azionari Indiegogo!

story:
As most people know my father has been suffering from a bad heart since he was 32yrs old when he had his heart attack. At 33 he had open heart surgery. He has been in and out of the hospital dozens of times over the years, and most recently is working with the URMC Transplant team and has qualified for a LVAD (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YBxDhUzSrsk). Dad is suppose to have the surgery on Wed 7/10/13. After Dad comes home he will have alot of expenses that him and my Mom will not be able to afford, Mostly anti rejection medications and dressings for the drive line for the pump. 

 

Thank you for your consideration and if you can not afford to help them out all we can ask for is a prayer.

Thank you for your consideration and if you can not afford to help them out all we can ask for is a prayer.

story:
SiempreSecos on the media!




RESUMEN - ABSTRACT

Nuestro objetivo es desarrollar un dispositivo de aviso reutilizable para todos los usuarios de pañal y sus cuidadores, que sea discreto, cómodo, higiénico, fácil de utilizar, para todo tipo de pañales y absorbentes de cualquier marca y adaptado a las necesidades de cada colectivo de usuarios, y así dar tranquilidad a las madres respecto a cuando cambiar el pañal, tratar eficazmente la enuresis nocturna, evitar la dermatitis del pañal, mejorar la autogestión de la incontinencia urinaria, mejorar la privacidad del usuario adulto del pañal, facilitar el trabajo del cuidador y permitir a los centros residenciales proporcionar una atención personalizada.
Our goal is to develop a reusable warning device for all diaper users and their carers. The device has to be discreet, comfortable, hygienic, easy to use, for all types of diapers and sanitary napkins of any brand and tailored to the needs of each group of users: To keep mothers informed when to change the diaper, provide effective treatment for nocturnal enuresis, prevent dermatitis diaper, improve self-management of urinary incontinence, improve the privacy of adult diaper users, facilitate the work of the caregiver and allowing residential centers provide personalized attention.

Necesitamos tu ayuda para poder industrializar el producto y poder distribuirlo al precio más bajo posible y así ayudar al máximo número de personas afectadas, pensando muy especialmente en los cuidadores de dependientes, los cuales consideramos que son los más afectados en su día a día por el uso de absorbentes higiénicos.
We need your help to industrialize the product and distribute it at the lowest price possible and help the greatest number of people affected, thinking most especially in caregivers, which we found are the most affected in their daily routine using sanitary absorbent.

DESCRIPCIÓN DEL PROYECTO - PROJECT DESCRIPTION

El proyecto "Siempre Secos" ofrece 5 soluciones a distintos:
"Always Dry" project offers 5 solutions to different problems:

CLIPIS (para bebés // for babies )

Consiste, por un lado, en un sensor de orina que se coloca en el pañal del bebé y por otro lado, en una pulsera para los padres que les indica el estado del pañal y les avisa con una vibración cuando hay que cambiarlo.
It comprises an urine sensor which is placed in the diaper, and a bracelet for parents which indicates the status of the diaper and alerts them with a vibration when need to change it.

Clipis está destinado a garantizar tu tranquilidad y te ayuda a:
Clipis is designed to ensure your peace of mind and help you:

  • Saber en que momento debes cambiar el pañal.
  • To know when you have to change the diaper.
  • Ahorrar, puesto que no volverás a tirar pañales secos.
  • Save money, because you'll never throw away dry diapers.
  • Mantener siempre seco a tu bebé, evitando la dermatitis del pañal, y
  • Always keep your baby dry, preventing diaper rash, and
  • Reducir el cambio de mudas.
  • Reduce clothing changes.

Ver vídeo de  Clipis // Watch the video on Clipis

 

KiDRY (para niños o adolescentes con enuresis // for kids or teens with nighttime bedwetting)

 

 

Consiste en un sensor de orina para niños con enuresis nocturna y una alarma de sobremesa, la cual se activa en el preciso instante en que se escapan las primeras gotas de orina, emitiendo una señal acústica para despertar al niñ@ y de esta forma tome conciencia y control sobre las micciones. También existe la posibilidad de poner el dispositivo en modo vibración para despertar únicamente al niño, muy útil sobretodo cuando tienen hermanos, van a dormir a casa de los amigos o van de colonias.
Consists of an urine sensor for kids with nighttime bedwetting and a desktop alarm, which is activated at the same moment that escape the first drops of urine, and beeps to aware about urination.
It is also possible to set the device on vibrate mode to wake up the child only, very useful especially when there are brothers and sisters in the same room, when they go to sleep at a friend's house or go camping.

KiDRY está destinado a: // KiDRY is designed to:

  • Ayudar al niño a controlar sus esfínteres durante la noche.
  • Help the child in the toilet training during the night.
  • Eliminar el problema de la enuresis definitivamente en el 70% de los casos.
  • Eliminating nighttime bedwetting definitely in 70% of cases.
  • Controlar la enuresis de forma paliativa en el otro 30% de los casos.
  • Controlling nighttime bedwetting in the other 30% of cases.
  • Restablecer la confianza del niño.
  • Restore the self confidence of the child.
  • Normalizar la dinámica familiar.
  • Normalize family dynamics.
  • Evitar coladas y gasto en pañales.
  • Prevent washings and diaper waste.

KiDRY Lite es un modelo sin receptor de sobremesa que avisa sólo por vibración del propio sensor. Es muy útil para cuando se pasa la noche fuera de casa o no se tiene un sueño tan profundo.
KiDRY Lite is model without desktop receptor which alerts the user by a vibration sensor. It is very useful when the child spends the night away from home or do not have such a deep sleep.

Ver vídeo de KiDRY // Wath video on KiDRY

 


 

Ignis (incontinencia urinaria severa // severe urinary incontinence)

 

 

Consiste en un sensor de orina para personas con incontinencia urinaria severa que se coloca en la compresa y una pulsera para el propio usuario que le indica el estado de la compresa y le avisa con una vibración cuando hay que cambiarla.
Consists of an urine sensor for users with severe urinary incontinence which is placed on the sanitary napkin and a bracelet that carries the user which displays the status of the sanitary napkin and warn with a vibration when you have to change it.

Ignis está destinado a: // Ignis is designed to:

  • Dar tranquilidad al incontinente sobre el estado de su absorbente.
  • Give peace of mind to incontinent on the status of your sanitary napkin.
  • Permitirle más discreción en su vida cotidiana, evitando manchas y olores.
  • Allow the incontinent more discretion in their daily lives, preventing stains and odors.

Ignis Lite es un modelo más sencillo y sin pulsera receptora, que te avisa por vibración del propio sensor cuando la compresa está saturada.
Ignis Lite is a simpler model without receiver bracelet that alerts the user by vibrating the sensor when the sanitary napkin has to be replaced.

Ver vídeo de Ignis // Watch the video on Ignis


 

Ignis Plus (para ancianos y dependientes // for elderly and dependent)

Consiste en un sensor de orina destinado al cuidado de ancianos y dependientes que se coloca en el pañal. En caso de uso doméstico, el cuidador cuenta con una pulsera que muestra el nivel de saturación del pañal. Ignis plus se adapta a todas las tallas de pañales de adulto.
Consists of an urine sensor for elders and dependent care that is placed in the diaper. If household, the caregiver has a bracelet that displays the saturation level of the diaper. Ignis plus fits adult diapers of all sizes.

Ignis Plus está destinado a: // Ignis Plus is intended for:

  • Mejorar la higiene de los pacientes.
  • Improve hygiene of patients.
  • Garantizar al máximo el respeto a la intimidad del dependiente.
  • Ensure full respect for the privacy of the dependent.
  • Dar tranquilidad al cuidador sobre el estado del absorbente.
  • Reassure the caregiver about the state of the sanitary napkin or diaper.
  • Ahorrar pañales eliminando los cambios innecesarios.
  • Save eliminating unnecessary diaper changes.
  • Evitar alterar al paciente, sobretodo, en casos de personas mayores con demencias.
  • Prevent altering the patient, especially in cases of older people with dementia or alzheimer.
  • Mejorar el sueño de los pacientes evitando despertarlos si están secos.
  • Improve patients' sleep avoiding wake them up if they are dry.

Ignis Plus Lite es un modelo más sencillo y sin pulsera receptora, que te mostrará el estado del pañal en el propio sensor mediante tres luces. También es un modelo adecuado para centros geriátricos que quiere racionalizar sus rutinas de cambio de pañal
Ignis Plus Lite is a simpler model without receiver bracelet, which will show the status of the diaper in the sensor itself through three lights. It is also a suitable model for nursing homes that want to streamline their diaper change routine.

Ver vídeo de Ignis Plus // Watch the video Ignis Plus


 

Ignis Profesional (centros geriátricos // geriatric centers)

El modelo profesional para geriátricos, funciona como los modelos domésticos, con la diferencia que muestra los avisos en un monitor (PC, Tablet, Smartphone) a disposición del equipo de enfermería, así como en dispositivo de bolsillo tipo “busca”.
The professional model for geriatrics, work as domestic models, with the difference that the ads displays on a monitor (PC, Tablet, Smartphone) available to nursing staff, as well as pocket device beeper type.

Ignis Profesional está destinado para: // Ignis Professional is designed to:

  • Mejorar la higiene de los pacientes hospitalizados o institucionalizados.
  • Improve the health of patients hospitalized or institutionalized.
  • Evitar olores y problemas cutáneos.
  • Prevent smells and skin problems.
  • Optimizar el trabajo del personal del centro.
  • Optimize the work of the nursing staff.
  • Racionalizar el uso de absorbentes en colectividades.
  • Rationalize the use of sanitary napkins and diapers.

RECOMPENSAS // REWARDS

NUESTRA APORTACIÓN // OUR CONTRIBUTION

Nuestra solución se basa en un detector de humedad extraplano, de tan solo unos milímetros de espesor, realizado en silicona médica y de una sola pieza que nos ofrece confort y facilidad de limpieza.
Our solution is based on a one-piece moisture detector slim, of only a few millimeters thick, made of medical silicone that offers comfort and ease of cleaning.

Las principales innovaciones del sistema "Siempre Secos" son el control de nivel de saturación del pañal y la ergonomía e higiene muy mejoradas frente a otros sistemas de detección de orina. También hemos eliminado los contactos metálicos, cables y piezas rígidas.
The main innovations of the system "Always Dry" are the control of diaper saturation level, highly improved ergonomics and hygiene compared to other old detection systems of urine. We have removed the metal contacts, cables and rigid parts also.

Nuestra solución: // Our solution:

  • Se puede utilizarse con o sin pañales o compresas (de cualquier marca).
  • Can be used with or without diapers or sanitary napkin (any brand).
  • Está orientado tanto a uso doméstico como a profesional (hospitales, guarderías o geriátricos).
  • It is aimed at both professional and domestic use to (hospitals, day care or geriatric).
  • Es 100% hipoalérgico ya que está realizado en silicona médica.
  • It is 100% hypoallergenic as it is made of medical silicone.
  • Es 100% higiénico ya que hemos prescindido de contactos eléctricos y hemos eliminado los recovecos y partes desmontables, por lo que se puede lavar cómodamente debajo del grifo o incluso desinfectar en cámaras de esterilización hospitalaria.
  • It is 100% hygienic and we have dispensed with electrical contacts and removed the nooks and removable parts, so it can be washed comfortably under running water or even disinfect hospital sterilization chambers.
  • No requiere de consumibles ni recambios y tiene una autonomía de 1 año.
  • It isn't requires no consumables or spare parts and has a range of 1 years.

EL PROYECTO YA CUENTA CON: // THE PROJECT HAS ALREADY:

  • Diversos prototipos.
  • Several prototypes
  • Se han seleccionado los proveedores  para la primera fase de producción.
  • Providers have been selected for the first phase of production.
  • Hemos establecido contacto con potenciales distribuidores y socios tecnológicos.
  • We have established contacts with potential distributors and technology partners.
  • Contacto con referentes del sector sanitario y puericultura (hospitales, asociaciones, geriátricos, pediatras)
  • Contact concerning health and childcare sector (hospitals, associations, geriatrics, pediatrics)
  • Una protección por patente industrial en proceso de registro.
  • An industrial patent protection registration process.

FUNDADORES // FOUNDERS

Somos Alberto y Mónica, ingeniero industrial y técnico superior en marketing digital y redes sociales, respectivamente, emprendedores por vocación y responsables del proyecto Siempre Secos.
We are Alberto and Monica, industrial engineer and technician in digital marketing and social networks respectively, entrepreneurs by vocation and “Always Dry” project managers.

Actualmente estamos dedicados en cuerpo y alma al proyecto y estamos aquí con el objetivo de encontrar financiación gracias a personas como tú.
Si quieres saber más sobre nosotros te invitamos a que visites nuestros perfiles de LinkedIn haciendo click en Alberto y Mónica.
Currently we are body and soul devoted to the project and we are here in order to find funding, thanks to people like you.
If you want to know more about us, we invite you to visit our LinkedIn profiles by clicking on Alberto and Mónica.

PRESUPUESTO // BUDGET

Hemos invertido unos 40.000€ y un año de trabajo. Contamos con un préstamo de 25.000€ y necesitamos tu ayuda para conseguir otros 20.000€ más para poder industrializar el proyecto y poder distribuir el producto al precio más bajo posible y así ayudar al máximo número de personas afectadas, pensando muy especialmente en los cuidadores de dependientes, los cuales consideramos que son los más afectados en su día a día por el uso de absorbentes higiénicos.
We have invested around 40,000€ and a year of intense work. We have a 25,000€ loan and we need your help to get another 20,000€ more for industrialising the project and distribute the product at the lowest price possible and to help the maximum number of people affected, thinking particularly on  caregivers, which we believe are the most affected in their daily rutine due to the use of sanitary napkins and diapers.

Estos 20.400€ los gastaremos en las siguientes partidas:
We will use this € 20,400 in the following items:

INGENIERÍA // ENGINEERING

7.300 €

Componentes, Esquema eléctrico, Rutado de placas, Generación de ficheros gerbers, Programación del firmware, Desarrollo interface usuario, Pruebas y test de validación.
Components, Wiring diagram, routing plate, Generating gerbers files, firmware programming, user interface development, testing and validation tests.

  

MECÁNICA // MECHANICAL

6.700 €

Moldes prototipo, Molde de pulsera, Molde de la base, Molde de los puntos de contacto, Matrices de curado, Plantilla de test electrónico.
Prototype molds, mold bracelet, mold base, mold contact points, Matrices curing, electronic test template.

  

ELECTRÓNICA // ELECTRONIC

3.700 €

Fabricación de placas de circuitos, Componentes, Montaje, Programación y verificación.
Manufacture of circuit boards, components, assembly, programming and verification.

  

EQUIPAMIENTO // EQUIPMENT

2.700 €

Material, Packaging, Utillajes, Equipos de programación y verificación.
Material, Packaging, Tooling, programming and verification equipment.

  

TOTAL

20.400 €

Esperamos tu aportación al proyecto // We hope your contribution to the project

Si no puedes hacer una aportación económica comparte nuestra campaña con tus amigos y conocidos y a través de facebook, twiter u otras redes sociales en las que participes.

Muchas gracias por tu ayuda!!

If you can not make a financial contribution share our campaign with your friends and acquaintances and through facebook, twitter or other social networks you participate.

Thank you very much for your help!

AGRADECIMINETOS ESPECIALES // SPECIAL THANKS

AFAB – Associació de Familiars de Malalts d'Alzheimer de Barcelona
EINA, Centre Universitari de Disseny i Art

Joaquim Jimenez Planells (jokim1989@gmail.com)
3D Designs: Carles Rojas Domènech (carlesrojas@hotmail.com)
Brands: Carlos Daniel Pamplona Orts (carlospamplona_@hotmail.com), Francesc Soria Castellet, Tania Alvarez Bravo, Jordi Esteban Moreno and Ruben Sanchez Arias

QUIERES SABER MÁS? // DO YOU WANT TO KNOW MORE?

Así nació Siempre Secos // Thus was born Always Dry

A raíz de vivir en primera persona los problemas del uso de pañales, decidimos desarrollar una solución para nuestro caso.
Al compartir nuestra experiencia con otras personas nos dimos cuenta de que el uso de pañales es mucho más habitual de lo que pensábamos y que afecta a diferentes colectivos de personas: padres y madres de bebés, niños con enuresis nocturna, personas con incontinencia urinaria, ancianos y dependientes.
Having firsthand experience the problems of using diapers we decided to develop a solution for our case.
By sharing our experience with others we realized that using diapers is far more common than we thought and it affects different groups of people who use: parents of babies, children with nighttime bedwetting , people with urinary incontinence, the elderly and dependent.

Como cuidadores NO hemos encontrado en el mercado una solución satisfactoria para gestionar el uso de estos consumibles por lo que nos hemos puesto manos a la obra para desarrollar este producto que pensamos nos ayudaría y ayudaría a mucha gente en su día a día, tanto si son usuarios como si son cuidadores.
As caregivers we have NOT found in the market a satisfactory solution to manage these supplies, so we set to work on developing this product we thought would help us and help many people in their daily lives, whether users as if they are caregivers.

Nuestro objetivo es desarrollar un dispositivo de aviso para todos los usuarios de pañal y sus cuidadores, que sea discreto, cómodo, higiénico, fácil de utilizar y adaptado a las necesidades de cada colectivo de usuarios, y así dar tranquilidad a las madres respecto a cuando cambiar el pañal, tratar eficazmente la enuresis nocturna, evitar la dermatitis del pañal, mejorar la autogestión de la incontinencia urinaria, mejorar la privacidad del usuario adulto del pañal, facilitar el trabajo del cuidador y permitir a los centros residenciales proporcionar una atención personalizada a la vez que reducen costes.
Our goal is to develop a warning device for all diaper users and their carers, discreet, comfortable, hygienic, easy to use and tailored to the needs of each group of users, and thus reassure mothers about when to change the diaper, provide effective treatment for nighttime bedwetting, prevent diaper rash, improve self-management of urinary incontinence, improve user privacy adult diaper, facilitate the work of the caregiver and allowing residential centers provide personalized service and reduce costs.

Alberto y Mónica son padres, hijos, cuidadores y algún día cuidados. Somos los fundadores de Siempre Secos y en nuestra vida profesional nos dedicamos a la ingeniería de producto y gestión de empresa.
Alberto and Monica are parents, children, caregivers and cared someday in the future. We are the founders of Always Dry and in our professional lives we are dedicated to product engineering and business management.
story_txt:
SiempreSecos on the media!



RESUMEN - ABSTRACT
Nuestro objetivo es desarrollar un dispositivo de aviso reutilizable para todos los usuarios de pañal y sus cuidadores, que sea discreto, cómodo, higiénico, fácil de utilizar, para todo tipo de pañales y absorbentes de cualquier marca y adaptado a las necesidades de cada colectivo de usuarios, y así dar tranquilidad a las madres respecto a cuando cambiar el pañal, tratar eficazmente la enuresis nocturna, evitar la dermatitis del pañal, mejorar la autogestión de la incontinencia urinaria, mejorar la privacidad del usuario adulto del pañal, facilitar el trabajo del cuidador y permitir a los centros residenciales proporcionar una atención personalizada.Our goal is to develop a reusable warning device for all diaper users and their carers. The device has to be discreet, comfortable, hygienic, easy to use, for all types of diapers and sanitary napkins of any brand and tailored to the needs of each group of users: To keep mothers informed when to change the diaper, provide effective treatment for nocturnal enuresis, prevent dermatitis diaper, improve self-management of urinary incontinence, improve the privacy of adult diaper users, facilitate the work of the caregiver and allowing residential centers provide personalized attention.

Necesitamos tu ayuda para poder industrializar el producto y poder distribuirlo al precio más bajo posible y así ayudar al máximo número de personas afectadas, pensando muy especialmente en los cuidadores de dependientes, los cuales consideramos que son los más afectados en su día a día por el uso de absorbentes higiénicos.We need your help to industrialize the product and distribute it at the lowest price possible and help the greatest number of people affected, thinking most especially in caregivers, which we found are the most affected in their daily routine using sanitary absorbent.
DESCRIPCIÓN DEL PROYECTO - PROJECT DESCRIPTION
El proyecto "Siempre Secos" ofrece 5 soluciones a distintos:"Always Dry" project offers 5 solutions to different problems:
CLIPIS (para bebés // for babies )

Consiste, por un lado, en un sensor de orina que se coloca en el pañal del bebé y por otro lado, en una pulsera para los padres que les indica el estado del pañal y les avisa con una vibración cuando hay que cambiarlo.It comprises an urine sensor which is placed in the diaper, and a bracelet for parents which indicates the status of the diaper and alerts them with a vibration when need to change it.
Clipis está destinado a garantizar tu tranquilidad y te ayuda a:Clipis is designed to ensure your peace of mind and help you: 

Saber en que momento debes cambiar el pañal.
To know when you have to change the diaper.
Ahorrar, puesto que no volverás a tirar pañales secos.
Save money, because you'll never throw away dry diapers.
Mantener siempre seco a tu bebé, evitando la dermatitis del pañal, y
Always keep your baby dry, preventing diaper rash, and
Reducir el cambio de mudas.
Reduce clothing changes.

Ver vídeo de  Clipis // Watch the video on Clipis
 


 
KiDRY (para niños o adolescentes con enuresis // for kids or teens with nighttime bedwetting)
 

 
Consiste en un sensor de orina para niños con enuresis nocturna y una alarma de sobremesa, la cual se activa en el preciso instante en que se escapan las primeras gotas de orina, emitiendo una señal acústica para despertar al niñ@ y de esta forma tome conciencia y control sobre las micciones. También existe la posibilidad de poner el dispositivo en modo vibración para despertar únicamente al niño, muy útil sobretodo cuando tienen hermanos, van a dormir a casa de los amigos o van de colonias.Consists of an urine sensor for kids with nighttime bedwetting and a desktop alarm, which is activated at the same moment that escape the first drops of urine, and beeps to aware about urination. It is also possible to set the device on vibrate mode to wake up the child only, very useful especially when there are brothers and sisters in the same room, when they go to sleep at a friend's house or go camping.
KiDRY está destinado a: // KiDRY is designed to:

Ayudar al niño a controlar sus esfínteres durante la noche.
Help the child in the toilet training during the night.
Eliminar el problema de la enuresis definitivamente en el 70% de los casos.
Eliminating nighttime bedwetting definitely in 70% of cases.
Controlar la enuresis de forma paliativa en el otro 30% de los casos.
Controlling nighttime bedwetting in the other 30% of cases.
Restablecer la confianza del niño.
Restore the self confidence of the child.
Normalizar la dinámica familiar.
Normalize family dynamics.
Evitar coladas y gasto en pañales.
Prevent washings and diaper waste.

KiDRY Lite es un modelo sin receptor de sobremesa que avisa sólo por vibración del propio sensor. Es muy útil para cuando se pasa la noche fuera de casa o no se tiene un sueño tan profundo.KiDRY Lite is model without desktop receptor which alerts the user by a vibration sensor. It is very useful when the child spends the night away from home or do not have such a deep sleep.
Ver vídeo de KiDRY // Wath video on KiDRY
 





 

Ignis (incontinencia urinaria severa // severe urinary incontinence)

 

 
Consiste en un sensor de orina para personas con incontinencia urinaria severa que se coloca en la compresa y una pulsera para el propio usuario que le indica el estado de la compresa y le avisa con una vibración cuando hay que cambiarla.Consists of an urine sensor for users with severe urinary incontinence which is placed on the sanitary napkin and a bracelet that carries the user which displays the status of the sanitary napkin and warn with a vibration when you have to change it.
Ignis está destinado a: // Ignis is designed to:

Dar tranquilidad al incontinente sobre el estado de su absorbente.
Give peace of mind to incontinent on the status of your sanitary napkin.
Permitirle más discreción en su vida cotidiana, evitando manchas y olores.
Allow the incontinent more discretion in their daily lives, preventing stains and odors.

Ignis Lite es un modelo más sencillo y sin pulsera receptora, que te avisa por vibración del propio sensor cuando la compresa está saturada.Ignis Lite is a simpler model without receiver bracelet that alerts the user by vibrating the sensor when the sanitary napkin has to be replaced.
Ver vídeo de Ignis // Watch the video on Ignis





 
Ignis Plus (para ancianos y dependientes // for elderly and dependent)

Consiste en un sensor de orina destinado al cuidado de ancianos y dependientes que se coloca en el pañal. En caso de uso doméstico, el cuidador cuenta con una pulsera que muestra el nivel de saturación del pañal. Joaquim Jimenez Planells (jokim1989@gmail.com)3D Designs: Carles Rojas Domènech (carlesrojas@hotmail.com)Brands: Carlos Daniel Pamplona Orts (carlospamplona_@hotmail.com), Francesc Soria Castellet, Tania Alvarez Bravo, Jordi Esteban Moreno and Ruben Sanchez Arias
QUIERES SABER MÁS? // DO YOU WANT TO KNOW MORE?
Así nació Siempre Secos // Thus was born Always Dry
A raíz de vivir en primera persona los problemas del uso de pañales, decidimos desarrollar una solución para nuestro caso. Al compartir nuestra experiencia con otras personas nos dimos cuenta de que el uso de pañales es mucho más habitual de lo que pensábamos y que afecta a diferentes colectivos de personas: padres y madres de bebés, niños con enuresis nocturna, personas con incontinencia urinaria, ancianos y dependientes.Having firsthand experience the problems of using diapers we decided to develop a solution for our case. By sharing our experience with others we realized that using diapers is far more common than we thought and it affects different groups of people who use: parents of babies, children with nighttime bedwetting , people with urinary incontinence, the elderly and dependent.
Como cuidadores NO hemos encontrado en el mercado una solución satisfactoria para gestionar el uso de estos consumibles por lo que nos hemos puesto manos a la obra para desarrollar este producto que pensamos nos ayudaría y ayudaría a mucha gente en su día a día, tanto si son usuarios como si son cuidadores.As caregivers we have NOT found in the market a satisfactory solution to manage these supplies, so we set to work on developing this product we thought would help us and help many people in their daily lives, whether users as if they are caregivers.
Nuestro objetivo es desarrollar un dispositivo de aviso para todos los usuarios de pañal y sus cuidadores, que sea discreto, cómodo, higiénico, fácil de utilizar y adaptado a las necesidades de cada colectivo de usuarios, y así dar tranquilidad a las madres respecto a cuando cambiar el pañal, tratar eficazmente la enuresis nocturna, evitar la dermatitis del pañal, mejorar la autogestión de la incontinencia urinaria, mejorar la privacidad del usuario adulto del pañal, facilitar el trabajo del cuidador y permitir a los centros residenciales proporcionar una atención personalizada a la vez que reducen costes.Our goal is to develop a warning device for all diaper users and their carers, discreet, comfortable, hygienic, easy to use and tailored to the needs of each group of users, and thus reassure mothers about when to change the diaper, provide effective treatment for nighttime bedwetting, prevent diaper rash, improve self-management of urinary incontinence, improve user privacy adult diaper, facilitate the work of the caregiver and allowing residential centers provide personalized service and reduce costs.

Alberto y Mónica son padres, hijos, cuidadores y algún día cuidados. Somos los fundadores de Siempre Secos y en nuestra vida profesional nos dedicamos a la ingeniería de producto y gestión de empresa.Alberto and Monica are parents, children, caregivers and cared someday in the future. We are the founders of Always Dry and in our professional lives we are dedicated to product engineering and business management.

story: Camp Ethan, a new, independent scout camp in Kansas, is just starting to  expand. The camp sits on a beautiful wooded-site and has a great pond for fishing.   Because there isn't a dock, the pond is currently underutilized. A dock would provide better opportunities for scouts and other youth groups to fish and increase the recreational options at the camp.   This project involves cleaning up the area and building a dock.

story:
TERMINAL CANCER MUSICIAN STRUGGLING TO OFFSET FREE PERFORMANCES

 

I HAVE BEEN DIAGNOSED WITH TERMINAL METASTATIC LUNG CANCER WITH BONE METASTASES.

I  PROVIDE FREE MUSCI PERFORMANCES FOR THE AMERICAN CANCER SOCIETY,   THE WELLNESS COMMUNITY, CANCER WALKS, VARIOUS DIFFERENT CHARITY EVENTS AND ST JOSEPH MERCY HOSPITAL ANN ARBOR MI USA.

MY PERFORMANCE COST, OF TRANSPORTATION, EQUIPMENT, PHYSICAL HELP AND GIVING AWAY FREE CD’s TO PATIENTS IS A COSTLY ENDEAVER, ALTHOUGH MY PERFORMANCES ARE FREE.

I AM DESTITUTE. I DO NOT RECEIVE ANY GOVERNMENT ASSISTANCE I.E. SOCIAL SECURITY OR DISABILITY INSURANCE. I AM SUPPORTED BY MY STRONG LOVING WIFE, TRULY MY CAREGIVER.

THE FEEDBACK FROM MANY PATIENTS, THEIR FAMILY MEMBERS AND ADMINISTRATORS ABOUT MY PERFORMANCES IS THAT I PROVIDE STRENGTH, HOPE AND INSPIRATION. ” I WISH TO CONTINUE THESE HEARTWARMING PERFORMANCES”

 

I AM ASKING FOR DONATIONS TO COVER THE COST OF THESE FREE CONCERTS, MY MUSIC HAS BROUGHT COMFORT AND HOPE TO MANY IF EVEN FOR JUST A FEW MOMENTS.  I AM REACHING OUT BECAUSE WE ALL HAVE BEEN TOUCHED IN SOMEWAY BY CANCER. THE PATIENTS AND FAMILY ‘S STRUGGLES  IS TREMENDOUS, THAT IS WHY I GIVE THE GIFT OF MUSIC.

story:
Think about the one and only person in your life who means the world to you. How much you adore them and how much you love them. Imagine living without them. Imagine the person who was always the glue that held everyone together is now fighting for their life.

Paul is just that to everyone he comes in contact with. He’s a wonderful devoted father of three beautiful girls, a friend to all who meet him and a protector to many. Paul suffers from stage five renal kidney failure. He is on dialysis three days a week for 8 hours at a time.

Paul was diagnosed with hypertension as a young boy. Coping and adjusting, he remained diligent to taking care of himself at a very young age. Now at the tender age of 47, he is fighting for his life from the loss of both kidneys.

Paul is on the kidney transplant list awaiting a match. His wait has been for three years now and like a champ and the fighter he is, he’s fighting on.

This campaign for Paul is the answer to our prayers. With both kidneys failed, waiting for a transplant and receiving dialysis, Paul is unable to work to make ends meet. After his treatments are done which is normally about 4am, Paul walks home about 5 miles. He walks back 5 miles three times per week after having the blood taken from his body, cleaned by a machine and then put back in.

What we need and what you can get? We are looking to raise $25,000 to help Paul. Being a humble person who does not like to ask anyone for anything, Paul is struggling. We want to help him get his car fixed or maybe another used car to get to his dialysis treatments and we want to help him to pay some of his medical and personal bills that are pressuring him financially.

I know you’re probably thinking $25,000 is a lot of money. But, to a person who is burdened with the challenges that Paul is faced with every day, it’s the assurance that Paul can live his life out comfortably while awaiting his kidney transplant.

Now, here’s what you get. You get a feeling of hope for Paul and his quest for life. You get the reward of knowing that knowing that you’ve helped someone who never asks for anything from anyone but really needs it.

I will be providing status updates on my Facebook page and will keep you posted on Paul's progress. We want to thank you for helping our friend and pray that your life will be greatly enriched by doing so.

story:
The idea of our diet has not been challenged in a long time. We decided to rethink the usual - to innovate food products using science and data. With the latest research in insect-eating, strict nutritional facts, and data analysis, we have come up with recipes for two all-natural products made with cricket flour - the best and the most sustainable protein source in the world.

We offer 2 categories of bars containing dried and milled crickets:  

PROTEIN BAR - the most innovative, all-natural, organic, low-carbohydrate protein bar, containing 20 grams of the highest quality protein in each bar.  

ENERGY BAR - a delicious, low-glycemic, organic fruity snack, packed with nutrients such as iron, calcium, omega 3 fatty acids, and the highest quality proteins.

  

FYI: As we are still fine-tuning the recipe of the bar, the final nutrition facts can slightly change in the future.

At SENS, we want to stay close to nature; therefore, we plan to pack our bars in a paper packaging and have wax on the inside. The bars will also be sealed in a modified atmosphere which increases shelf life.  

Thanks to the combination of these packaging ways and a smart selection of ingredients, we can guarantee a 1-year shelf life without the need of chemicals or added preservatives.

 

 

 

 Hello, we are SENS! A young European team operating in 6 different languages, but mostly in English. It all started when Daniel and Radek fell in love with entomophagy, the practice of eating insects, and what it could bring to our planet’s current state. They teamed-up with a renowned chef with 13 years of experience in cooking with insects. The chef took part in making our bars taste great, while we focused on the nutritional content with the help from various nutritional experts and food technologists.

 

“We want to offer the western world a new and alternative diet that is superior, more sustainable and moral compared to our current diet.”

 EU backers - Shipping costs: 

  • FREE - no shipping costs to EU backers for their rewards

 Non-EU backers - Shipping costs:

  •  FREE - the “Your support counts!” reward consists of an ebook and the delivery of this reward is free 
  • 4 USD - The “You are the best!” reward consists of 4 bars and the shipping cost is 4 USD 
  • 9 USD - All other rewards consisting of one package (12 bars) or more have a shipping cost of 9 USD

Even for the US custommers (and all other non-EU citizens), there should not be any tariffs or other customs fees thanks to the right size of packaging.

October

  • Finalizing all the necessary regulatory requirements for production
  • Getting all the supplies and packaging materials

November

  • Production and packaging

December

  • Delivery of bars and cotton bags before Christmas!


Attention: There was a delay with the production of bars. Read more in our update.

 Your support will help bring this project to life. You should definitely be rewarded for that :-) Rewards will be sent to you depending on the pledge you chose.

SENS bars  

  • You’ll be able to choose a combination of any of our bars. There are two different flavours of our delicious SENS Energy bars, and two different flavours of our nutritious SENS protein bars.

One year monthly subscription

  • A year-long subscription to receive a SENS box (containing 12 SENS bars) a month, with your choice of which flavours should be in there each month :-)

“Top 10 Insect Recipes” ebook  

  • A digital copy of our chef’s insect cookbook with useful tips on how to make insects delicious!

Backers-ONLY Specials

  • A special backers-only offerings including special discounts + being among the first ones to test new SENS products, flavours and more!

Stickers - SENS & Entomophagy

  • Stickers to show others that you support the future of food.  

Cotton bags  

  • Entomophagy cotton bag - practical, beautiful, and displaying your openness to new ideas. Available in 3 different designs.  

Weekend getaway in a 4-star hotel resort & spa + an insect menu prepared by our very own chef

  • Spend two nights for 2 people in a 4-star hotel & spa in Austria + an insect menu prepared by our very own chef Peter. You can choose to enjoy this menu just by yourself or have the possibility to invite Daniel & Radek who will be more than happy to spend time with you.

 

Die Vorstellung von unserer Ernährung wurde schon lange nicht mehr richtig hinterfragt. Wir haben uns dazu entschlossen das Gewohnte zu überdenken – hin zu innovativen Nahrungmitteln, unterstützt von Wissenschaft und Fakten. Unter Ausnutzung der neuesten Erkenntnisse über Insekten als Nahrungsmittel, alimentärer Fakten und Datenauswertung, haben wir Rezepte für zwei reine Naturprodukte mit Grillenmehl – der besten und nachhaltigsten Eiweißquelle der Welt – entwickelt.

Wir bieten zwei Arten von Riegeln mit getrockneten und gemahlenen Grillen an:  

EIWEIßRIEGEL – Der innovative, rein natürliche, organischer, kohlenhydratarme Eiweißriegel mit 20 Gramm hochwertigem Eiweiß in jedem Riegel.

ENERGIERIEGEL – Ein köstlich süßer und organischer Snack mit geringem glykämischem Index, voll mit Nährstoffen wie Eisen, Kalzium, Omega-3-Fettsäuren und hochwertigem Eiweiß.

Hier bei SENS wollen wir uns die Nähe zur Natur bewahren. Deshalb planen wir unsere Riegel mit einer Papierverpackung mit Innenbeschichtung aus Wachs zu versehen. Die Riegel werden außerdem in einer Schutzgaspackung versiegelt um die Haltbarkeit zu erhöhen.

Dank der Kombination aus den beiden Verpackungsmethoden und einer bewussten Auswahl der verwendeten Zutaten können wir eine Mindesthaltbarkeit von einem Jahr auch ohne Chemikalien und Konservierungsstoffe gewährleisten.

Hallo, wir sind SENS! Als junges, europäisches Team operieren wir in sechs Sprachen, aber hauptsächlich in Englisch. Alles begann als Daniel und Radek sich in die Entomophagie - den Verzehr von Insekten als Nahrungsmittel – und deren potentiellen Vorteile für den Planeten verliebten. Sie schlossen sich mit einem renomierten Chefkoch mit über 13 Jahren Erfahrung im Kochen mit Insekten zusammen. Dieser beteiligte sich maßgeblich daran unseren Riegeln einen großartigen Geschmack zu verleihen, während wir uns zusammen mit diversen Ernährungsexperten und Nahrungsmitteltechnikern dem Nährstoffgehalt annahmen.

 

 "Wir wollen der westlichen Welt eine neue, alternative Ernährungsweise anbieten, die nachhaltiger und moralischer als die derzeitige Ernährungsweise ist."

EU-Unterstützer:

  • GRATIS - Versandkosten sind für EU-Unterstützer in den Preisen der Belohnungen mit inbegriffen. Es entstehen keine Extrakosten.  

Nicht-EU-Unterstützer:  

  • GRATIS - Die „Your support counts!“-Belohnung enthält ein E-Book. Der Versand dieser Belohnung ist kostenlos.
  • 4 USD – Die „You are the best!“-Belohnung enthält vier Riegel. Es fallen 4 USD Versandkosten an.
  • 9 USD – Es fallen 9 USD Versandkosten für alle Belohnungen an, die ein oder mehrere Packete (12 Riegel). 

Selbst für Nicht-EU-Bürger sollte es dank der richtigen Verpackungsgröße keine Zölle oder Zollgebühren geben.

Oktober
  • Abschluss aller nötigen regulatorischen Anforderungen für die Produktion
  • Zusammestellung aller Betriebsmittel und des Verpackungsmaterials

November

  • Produktion und Verpackung

Dezember

  • Lieferung aller Riegel und Stofftaschen noch vor Weihnachten!

Achtung: Es gab eine Verzögerung bei der Produktion der Riegel. Lesen Sie mehr in unserem Update.

Deine Unterstützung hilf dabei dieses Projekt zu ermöglichen. Dafür sollst du belohnt werden :-)

Es gibt eine Vielzahl von Belohnungen für die unterschiedlichen Beiträge.

SENS Bars

  • Wähle eine beliebige Kombination aus Riegeln. Es gibt zwei Geschmacksrichtungen köstlicher SENS Energieriegel und zwei Geschmacksrichtungen nahrhafter SENS Eiweißriegel.  

One year monthly subscription

  • Erhalte 12 Riegel pro Monat im Jahresabo. Die gewünschten Geschmacksrichtungen können beliebig gewählt werden :-)

„Top 10 Insect Recipes“ ebook

  • Digitale Kopie des Kochbuchs unseres Chefkochs mit nützlichen Tipps zur Zubereitung von köstlichen Insekten!

Backers-ONLY Specials

  • Special-Belohnungen nur für Unterstützer. Nutze Special-Discounts, sei unter den ersten Testern unserer neuen Produkte und Geschmacksrichtungen, und vieles mehr!

Stickers - SENS & Entomophagy

  • Aufkleber. Bekenne Farbe für die Ernährung der Zukunft!

Cotton bags in 3 designs

  • Stofftaschen im Entomophagie-Design. Praktisch, anschaulich, zeige deine Offenheit für neue Ideen.

Weekend getaway in a 4-star hotel & spa + an insect menu prepared by our very own chef 

  • Verbringe zwei Nächte für zwei Personen ein einem 4-Sterne Spa Hotel in Österreich mit einem Insektenmenü, zubereitet durch unseren Chefkoch Peter. Gerne gesellen sich auch Daniel & Radek dazu :-)

Verbringe zwei Nächte für zwei Personen ein einem 4-Sterne Spa Hotel in Österreich mit einem Insektenmenü, zubereitet durch unseren Chefkoch Peter. Gerne gesellen sich auch Daniel & Radek dazu :-)

story: Nicholas is 17 months old,battling stage 4 cancer. At this time he is on a regimen of five different types of chemotherapy every-other week. He has already lost the top right portion of his lung, as it was removed along with the tumor for biopsy. The primary tumor on his back will be rescanned by late October. This scan will tell if the chemotherapy is working, or if it still spreading and how far. Additionally it will determine if surgery on the primary tumor is feasible. After this determination, he will undergo eight weeks of radiation therapy, targeted on his lungs and the primary tumor site along with twenty two more cycles of chemotherapy. This is bound to be a long and arduous task on my family. I beg anyone, please have a heart and donate to help my son.
