story:
** As many of you know, we were initially looking to launch our campaign on Kickstarter, as reflected in our video. Unfortunately, our campaign was rejected due to the charitable nature of our company (Kickstarter is not a platform for charitable ventures).

Luckily for us, Indiegogo came to the rescue, and we are thrilled that our campaign has finally been able to find a home!

You can help us by spreading the word- link our campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media account to let your friends and family know!

THANK YOU!

clare & jessie

 ---

Why soap? 

Clare traveled to Kaberamaido, Uganda in the spring of 2012 where she witnessed the desperate need for basic health necessities.  Clare eventually brainstormed an idea to make her own soap and use proceeds to donate/invest in developing communities that lacked basic sanitation.

After pitching the idea to Jessie, the pair did their research and realized that there was a problem at home. They didn't recognize any of the ingredients listed on the average bar soap. And thus, a two-fold vision was born - 1) to educate and provide an all-natural product for those at home and 2) to create a sustainable sanitation program for the people in Kaberamaido, Uganda.

What we've done so far...

Believe it or not, the past 8-9 months were filled with busy nights and weekends. Here's a rough timeline. 

August/September: Researched the all-natural soap market. Learned how to make soap, experimented with flavors, scents, etc...

October: Hurricane Sandy hits. Enough said. 

November/December: Started creating the brand, including the logo and website. After conducting several rounds of pricing sensitivity analysis, decided we wanted to create an affordable all-natural soap, as many alternatives were priced between $8-10. Settled on a $4.99/bar pricing strategy for core soaps. 

Our final logo conveys a simple, pure, and natural product with a hint of playfulness.

January: Obtained a LLC, small business bank account, and squared away other logistical issues. Selected Shopify as our ecommerce solution. Contacted a ton of packaging companies for packaging solutions. Created our Facebook fanpage!

February: Finalized shipping. Decided on a $5.99 flat rate shipping model that encompasses 2-3 day shipping with tracking ability (while supporting our favorite USPS postman!)

March: Solidified marketing segmentation with goal of not only providing an affordable all natural soap alternative, but also an educational experience to encourage eco-friendly/sustainable solutions. Scrapped previous boxing ideas and embraced recycled packaging including seeded-paper that can be planted! 

April: Working on finalizing product packaging, streamlining processes, and launching a crowdfunding campaign!

Throughout the entire time, we continuously made dozens upon dozens of bars of soap. We gave them out to friends and family to test and solicited feedback from the labeling to the product itself. 

Label progression, none of which made the final cut.

We even evolved our stamping and obtained a custom stamp of our logo. For the first stamp, Clare actually made a DIY attempt by carving letters out of clay and making a stamp out of epoxy! Lucky for us, there is a man halfway around the world sitting in a room with a machine capable of making laser precision cut custom stamps!

An improvement, we'd say.

Our Vision

In the past few months, we’ve debated and wrestled with our vision. At first we wanted to follow a "buy one, give one" model.  At the same time, we knew we wanted to instill a spirit of entrepreneurialism within the villagers. After reading “When Helping Hurts” by Steve Corbett & Brian Fikkert, we realized the fallacies and faults in the "buy one, give one" model. 

  • Soap is a consumable good. What happens after the donated bar runs out? 
  • Would we be hindering the progress of local soapmakers by giving our bars away for free?
  • How can we instill a spirit of entrepreneurialism if locals expect free bars?
  • Is it even feasible for us to donate the bars? There are logistical and customs issues (and potentially corruption).

As Corbett and Brian have correctly observed, it is important to understand thatdevelopment is not done to people or for people but with people. 

The initial hope is to provide soap and educate people the importance of sanitation. Our long-term vision is to invest in communities by teaching the trade of soap making as a mean of economic self-sustainability. This differs greatly from many social enterprises that are simply “giving” resources away. Our model will involve commitment, perseverance, and investments in relationships, but it is one that we are willing to commit too.

Hmm... seriously, do people need soap?

The short and obvious answer is YES. Otherwise, we, as well as many other non-profits and charities would not be doing this. Sanitation is a HUGE issue in many parts of the world. 

Watch how this child cleans his plate. The footages below were taken by our friend Josh, who traveled to Kaberamaido, Uganda in the fall of 2012.

 

IMG 1351 from jessie yoh on Vimeo.

IMG 1342 from jessie yoh on Vimeo.

Kids also eat with their hands after playing in the dirt. While their immune systems are undoubtedly stronger than ours, millions of kids still die from the bacteria and germs that could be easily prevented by a bar of soap.

Partnering with Children's Hopechest in Kaberamaido, Uganda

We are super fortunate to have found such a supportive partner. We intend to focus solely on Kaberamaido and building a lasting relationship with the villagers and children. Development can take years, even decades, but we are prepared to make the commitment because we want our efforts to be self-sustainable.

Speaking of sustainability...

We also knew that we wanted to create a company that focused beyond economic sustainability- we wanted to minimize our carbon footprint as much as possible. We are excited to announce that

  • Our bars are wrapped in recycled white butcher paper
  • Each bar includes a "tag," displaying general labeling information (ie flavor, ingredients, etc). The tag is printed on seeded-paper. This means that you can wet the paper, plant it into a pot of soil, and watch it grow. If you choose not to grow it, the paper will naturally decompose on its own.
  • We obtain our palm oil from an active Member of RSPO (Roundtable on Sustainable Palm).
Image of seeded-paper courtesy of Botanical Paperworks

So, I'm hooked, but who should use our soaps?

Anyone and everyone! Our soaps are made from 100% all natural ingredients. We use a blend of palm, olive, coconut, soy, and castor oil and enrich all bars with shea butter. We only use essential oils (not fragrance oils) to scent our bars, and any exfoliants or colorants are also 100% all natural. 

All natural soaps are great for those with sensitive skin. We've had super positive feedback, including those with children. One mother particularly loves our soap because it easily cleans away markings and stampings on her child's skin! But like all products, we recommend that you test the soap on a small area of your skin before using it on your whole body.

Soap Care

If taken care of properly, an all natural bar of soap should last the same, if not longer, amount of time as your average commercial bar soap. We recommend storing the soap in a dry and cool area with open ventilation, so soap dishes are advised to prevent water from accumulating under the soap. It's also important that you do not store your soap in a sealed container or zip lock bag.

Remember, because our soaps do not contain preservatives, we recommend using our soap within a year.

Video Credits

Directed by Alexandra Stergiou
Opening footage and music by
The children of Kaberamaido, November 2012

Music by
Jahzzar- So Easy

story:
Hello my name is Dan Johnston am a 30-year-old quadriplegic that was injured on August 10, 2002 where I suffered a spinal cord injury, traumatic brain injury, and two lacerated lungs. I was skeletally decapitated internally which basically means my head was not connected to my body via my spine and I was in a coma for 30 days. The doctors told my parents to shut off the life-support but they prayed about it and trusted in God to make that decision. The funds from this campaign would help buy things I need for everyday living also help me with purchasing the special foods I need to keep me on a specific diet to avoid pressure sores. And to help pay for aides and therapist to help me do every day tasks and keep my body limber. Any money donated would be greatly appreciated and it would help a fellow man who cannot do many things for himself. Thanks for your help and may God be praised.

Something I forgot to mention that helps me get through times when I need an uplift at any given time is this verse, 

1 Peter 4:12-13 Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you: But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.

 I will be updating this periodically as I think of more stuff. All proceeds goes to the Daniel a Johnston special needs trust fund FYI

Any additional money that is raised will go to my next wheelchair because insurance isn't going to pay for it and this one is getting to be almost five years old. The one I'm using currently was about 25,000 which is ridiculous but true. Thanks so much for all your support

story:
한글,中文,日本語, español

 

 

PHI GOLF is the multi-platform golf simulation device that attaches to the back of any club, providing swing analysis and realistic golf game play. Practice on your own or play a round with friends, all from the comfort of your own home or office.

 

 


Putting analysis tracks your club trajectory and speed for a full breakdown of your stroke. Offering both an overhead and side view, see the path of your putting stroke. Putting analysis with Phi Golf includes: Head speed, Swing Tempo, Swing Path, Open Angle & Launch Angle.    

Re-visualize your swing with PHI GOLF. Swing analysis offers a second look at every swing you take and marks a silhouette of the composition of your swing. Swing Analysis with Phi Golf includes: Head Speed, Swing Path, Swing Tempo, Face Angle, Distance & Launch Angle. 

Ball Trajectory tracks the path of your ball as it flies towards the hole. View an overview of the flight paths of your previous shots through marked trajectory lines. Ball Trajectory analysis with PHI GOLF measures your hook & slice while even factoring in wind conditions.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

In 2013, we at the PhiGolf Team sought to return the thrill of golf back into golf practice. The first prototype of this multi-platform (TV, tablet, smartphone) golf simulation took over 4 years. In the process, not only did we create our own unique swing analysis algorithm, we also built an interactive and realistic golf game from the ground up. Now Phi Golf is on the last step towards production. We very much hope that you will enjoy Phi Golf as much as we do!

story: I am raising money for Hormone Replacement Therapy. This will cover my doctor visits and Hormones just to get me started. I have been out for 4 years and money is always so tight. I try to save up but something happens and I get set back all over again. Its a process that I have been ready for. I Just need some help. With this new job and place I have been able to make a small life but its not mine. I need it to be mine. I am ready for this change on the outside as well as in. Please help if you can.

story:
Project Summary

It is aimed – in this project – to take measures against obesity which is the biggest health problem of today’s world. Therefore, a healthy, personalized and flexible nutrition program needs to be prepared by a professional support based on the needs of the body.

We aim to provide personal and professional support for the ones who want to reach their ideal body level and cannot go to the dietitians or gyms for professional support.

Lifecare is not only a personal product but also a product service. The body analysis can be done anywhere with the portable body analyzer. Body analyses are tracked with Lifecare mobile application and it provides an instant communication with the dietician.

Dietitians can also follow the their clients’ body analysis results by analyzing their health, diet and personal information through the dietician control panel, thus, dietitians prepares the most suitable nutrition program to their clients’ needs.

Problem

What many people complain about the weight problem? This is because 1.9 billion people in the world are experiencing weight problems. If this situation cannot be prevented, one out of 2 person in 2030 is expected to have obesity.

Today, people have an intense and fast life. High-calorie nutrition, sedentary life and stress cause weight gain in humans. Those who complain about their body ask the Internet "how to lose weight?", they start their diet on Monday and give up on Tuesday. The reason for this is that the person cannot provide self-motivation and does not know what the body needs.
Some people need dietitian support. Personal nutrition programs are followed by dieticians. But nowadays, dietitian interviews are replaced by online diet system. The main reasons for this are face-to-face dietician interviews that people cannot find time, loss of motivation in the process, lack of personal follow-up and budget constraint.

Solution

Here we have developed and designed the Lifecare body analyzer and system at this point. With the body analyzer you will have access to as much professional results as the dietitians' offices, you will be able to see that your body is more than what is visible in the mirror. Body analysis will be done at the intervals determined by your dietician and you can follow your results with Lifecare mobile app. Your dietician will be able to follow and update your nutrition program in the most appropriate way by following you with the Lifecare dietitian control panel in its professional environment. It will also be able to reach the client through the online system.
Thus, we bring professionalism in the dietitian offices to your home. We aim to provide you with a highly motivated personal control while protecting your time and budget.


Lifecare Body Analyzer

Your body is more than it looks in the mirror!

With Lifecare Body Analyzer, you can get the most accurate and detailed information about your body at home. You can do body analysis easily wherever and whenever you want, and contact the experts through Lifecare's professional dietitian system for the most suitable nutrition plan according to your results.

Things you can learn with the Lifecare Body Analyzer; 

Body Mass Index

Total and Regional Impedance

Total Fat Ratio and Weight

Total Muscle Ratio and Weight

Body Lean Mass

Metabolic Rate

 

Lifecare Mobile App

Your dietitian is a click away with Lifecare app!

Track your Body Analysis at any moment

See the results of your measurements with the Lifecare analyzer

See your nutrition plan

Get in touch with your dietitian and easily reach your specially created diet program

Contact your nutritionist through the Lifecare app or website

Communicate with your dietitian at any moment and get professional support

 

Lifecare Dietitian Control Panel

When you are supporting your advisees, Lifecare will support you

With the Lifecare dietitian panel, you can see all the necessary information about your advisees on a single page in an organized way. This way you can easily plan personal nutrition programs for your advisees, follow them up and receive safe payment for these programs.

With the Lifecare dietitian panel you can see the following in the advisee profile;

Lifecare Body Analyzer Data

Advisees' Health and Personal Information

Advisees' Body Measurements

Advisees' Meal Information

Advisees' Blood Analysis Result

Instant communication through Lifecare to ensure high motivation

The online conversation feature on the Lifecare dietitian panel allows you to answer instant questions from your advisees or to instantly tell what you want to say to your advisees

 

Who we are?

Our team consists of experts in the field. For this project; we have 2 Industrial designers, 1 web developer, 1 mobile developer , 1 engineer, and 1 advertising and public relations specialist. 

We are together to touch people's lives and to combine design and innovation.

We believe that being an innovative is more important than the being new and keep dreaming and working on it.

Our supporter;

 

 

Risks & Challenges

When the product is in the process of prototyping, we will start mass production. We want to revise the product design before mass production. Because we want to send you more design products.

This way you can easily plan personal nutrition programs for your advisees, follow them up and receive safe payment for these programs.With the Lifecare dietitian panel you can see the following in the advisee profile;Lifecare Body Analyzer DataAdvisees' Health and Personal InformationAdvisees' Body MeasurementsAdvisees' Meal InformationAdvisees' Blood Analysis ResultInstant communication through Lifecare to ensure high motivationThe online conversation feature on the Lifecare dietitian panel allows you to answer instant questions from your advisees or to instantly tell what you want to say to your advisees Who we are?Our team consists of experts in the field. For this project; we have 2 Industrial designers, 1 web developer, 1 mobile developer , 1 engineer, and 1 advertising and public relations specialist. We are together to touch people's lives and to combine design and innovation.We believe that being an innovative is more important than the being new and keep dreaming and working on it.Our supporter;  Risks & ChallengesWhen the product is in the process of prototyping, we will start mass production. We want to revise the product design before mass production. Because we want to send you more design products.

story:
About this project

The Broke Man's half marathon is about spreading the love of longer distance running, community, and the benefits of physical fitness. People should be able to run, and enjoy the positive atmosphere of the organized race, regardless of ability to pay heafty race fees. Thus, the Broke Man's half marathon was born. 

Each year the Broke Man's half marathon has been runner funded! Meaning, we build the race according to the budget that is laid out based off of registration. This has aloud us to create an awesome race for the runners so far. 

But this year... we want to do more. 

The Broke Man's would like to move out of the park atmosphere and move onto the streets, as well as provide a little more of an organized atmosphere for the participants. 

In order to do this we need to permit the race before we can officially open registration, so we are selling race registrations through the form of an official Indiegogo project in order to get the funding for permitting! Once we reach the end of the Indiegogo project, we will permit our race based on our funding, and open up official registration, course, and everything else!

Once official registration has opened, all project backers will receive 1 free registration code to register for the race!

The race will still be an official training run for the Columbus marathon. Race date will be October 4th!

Want to in a free "Broke Man in training" shirt?? Share your registration on your social media networks and let me know you did so. We will be picking one winner a week through the month of January to win! 

Risks and challenges

A good race comes with a solid budget, that offers additions and subtractions. Outside of the basic necessities, there are a lot of ways to put on a good race on a lower budget.

Once the project is funded we will have great projected budget to determine how we can build the race with that specific budget.


**NOTE: YOU MUST LEAVE YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS IN ORDER TO RECIEVE YOUR REGISTRATION CODE. IF YOU DO NOT LEAVE YOUR CONTACT INFORMATION WE WILL NOT BE ABLE TO SEND YOU YOUR CODE****

story:
Short Summary

I have a once in a lifetime opportunity to travel the world and I've decided that I want to give back a bit while I'm doing it.  So I've decided to leverage my photographic skills to raise money for Trilogy.  Trilogy is an organization that helps out here in Chicago by providing services for people recovering from Mental Illness. 

What We Need & What You Get

To raise the money, I'm offering the opportunity to buy a completely unique photo.  When I say "unique" I mean that there will be exactly one physical print of that photo in existence, and it will be yours.  I'll have no other prints or even a digital copy of the photo; so even if I forgot about this campaign later and decided to make a copy, I wouldn't be able to.  

Why Mental Health?

Over the past few years, mental health services in Chicago have been slashed as part of budget cuts.  The tragedy of this is that many who suffer from mental illness can have happy and healthy lives if they get the support services they need.  Trilogy is a non-profit here that's doing its best in the face of these cuts to help the people who need it.  

Many of my closest friends suffer from mental illness and I've seen how getting the proper care has made a huge difference in their lives.  I've seen the struggles that they've gone through day to day, and how small changes can make a big difference for them.  So I'm hoping that with this effort, collectively, we can make a difference for a few other people here in Chicago. 

Q&A

Where will you be going?

I'll be travelling to Japan, Thailand, Turkey, the Czech Republic, Sweden, the Netherlands, Belgium, and France.  

What will my photo be a picture of?

Honestly, I have no idea.  My plan is to take a ton of photos and try to find a good collection of photos that I think people will like.  From that collection I will print out one copy of each photo, sign it, and then send it to you.  Then, once you receive your photo, I'll delete my copy of the image.  Gone.  Forever.

Basically I'm thinking of these photos as post cards.  So odds are it will be a photo of some architecture, or a nice landscape.  It might be of some people on the street, depending on what takes my interest at the time.   

How will you choose which photo to send to me?

I'll assemble the collection of photos, and then pick who gets what without any reference to their name, etc.  So nobody is getting preferential selections unless they choose the "Dibs!" level.  If somebody buys that, then they get to choose first from the collection.  Otherwise, it's whatever the fates decide.

What if I don't like the photo that's been chosen for me?

Sorry about that.  You gave money to a good cause, though so at least you have that warm fuzzy feeling to savor while you throw my photo in the trash.  

What if I wanted to have another copy of the photo?

Well I won't be able to make you a copy, so if you want to scan it in, etc, I'm not going to stop you.  If you posted a copy of it to your facebook or twitter to say, "look at this cool photo I got", that'd be fine too.  If you want to get into the legalese, it would be Creative Commons licensed as "Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike".

What if I don't want you to destroy the copies?

If you are okay with me keeping a copy of your photo, that's great!  Just send me a comment to let me know that's what you want.  Just bear in mind that if you say I can keep it, that means I can do anything I want with it.  If you don't tell me otherwise, your copy will definitely be the only one.  

What if you are eaten by one of the famed photographer eating bears of the Czech Republic?

What I promise to you is to make a best effort to pull this off.  I'll be hauling a bunch of technology around the planet, and there's always the chance that something is just going to die on me.  My camera might stop working, a memory card might lose its memory, or I could be eaten by one of those pesky bears.  I'm trying to do this to raise money for a good cause, and that's really the point here.  I will make a best effort to ensure you get the photo.  

How much of my money will go to the charity?

I am planning to cover all of the printing costs of the photos, so other than the cut that Indeigogo takes for hosting this effort, all of the money will go directly to Trilogy.  Your payment will be handled by FirstGiving, Indiegogo's partner for handling payments to charities.  

How can we follow your travels?

I'll be posting at Facebook and my blog as I travel.  I'm just getting this blog started but you can find it here: http://www.stearnsimages.com/blog.  My Facebook is http://www.facebook.com/StearnsImages.  I'll be posting some photos along the way, but don't worry, I'll be taking thousands of photos, so there will be plenty left for this campaign.

story:
The quick version

Help us produce and distribute 11,000 Yes flags to support indyref2, and an independent Scotland in Europe.


What We Need & What You Get

The original 10,000 Flags For Yes project in 2014 put Yes saltires into the hands of campaigners all over Scotland in advance of the Independence Referendum (Indyref). We want to do the same again, but this time with a focus on keeping Scotland in the European Union, and to support Indyref2.

Scots voted 62% in favour of staying in the EU in the recent UK-wide referendum. All 32 Scottish council regions voted in favour. But despite this, the UK government, run by an internally-focused and divided Tory party, wants to drag Scotland out of the EU against our will. That is simply unacceptable.

The Scottish Parliament, with the support for all political parties - except the Tories - is fighting tooth and nail against this injustice. We need to show how strongly we feel about this on the streets of Scotland, keep the public pressure up on the UK government, and support our Scottish Government.

A total of 11,000 flags will be split across two designs; the original Yes Saltire, and a new "EU Saltire" (below) design that supports an independent Scotland within the European Union.


Not all pro-indy folk support EU membership, so we're offering you the choice of either flag - or both!

By selecting one of the perks you will receive your choice of flag (or both!), plus additional goodies to help spread the message far and wide. Your donation will pay to have 1,000 flags produced and distributed almost immediately, followed by a bulk shipment of 10,000 flags which we will distribute to Yes groups across Scotland through the National Yes Registry. So we're producing more flags, and faster than last time.

The first 1,000 flags will go out as perks; so ideally we want activists donating early - or people who can put them into the hands of activists! If donation perks exhaust the first 1,000 flags, the remaining perks will be shipped from the bulk order of 10,000 later. So it's first come, first serve - if you want a flag quickly, get in early!

The Impact


During the Indyref, seeing so many Yes saltires in villages and towns as well as organised peaceful demonstrations had a hugely positive impact on the Yes campaign. It's time to re-kindle that Yes spirit, and use it to campaign for an Independent Scotland within Europe.

Even if you don't support EU membership, Scots have a right to self-determination and it must be our choice whether we stay in the EU or not. It is not acceptable for Westminster to impose its Brexit will on Scotland, especially through the negative, fear-laden, scaremongering and borderline racist campaigns that we experienced during the EU Referendum.

Securing independence for Scotland means we can make these decisions for ourselves. So even if you're not keen on the EU, please support our project so that in future these decisions will be made by Scots, not the UK Tory party.


The target

We need to raise more money this time as we're doing things a bit differently. Brexit has caused a massive political shock throughout Europe, and rapidly put indyref2 back on the table. We need to get out and support indyref2 as quickly as possible. So we're paying extra to get 1,000 flags produced within one to two weeks, and a bulk order of 10,000 following 6-8 weeks later.

The first 1,000 flags cost £1,500, and the bulk order of 10,000 costs £10,000. On top of that is postage and packing, Indiegogo's fees, and a small sum towards badges and stickers. The crowdfunding fees - and postage - have gone up since 2014, so that's why we need a bit more money this year.

This project is being organised by ayeMail, the not-for-profit dedicated to Scottish Independence which helped produce the Wee Blue Book in 2014, and the Wee Black Book this year.  We're working with the National Yes Registry to distribute the bulk delivery of flags to Yes groups across Scotland. These bulk flags will be delivered completely free, paid for by your donations; it will be up to them to decide whether they give them away locally, or charge a modest sum to help support their own activities.

Any funds raised over the target will go to producing more stickers, badges and other materials to help support the campaign. These will be distributed to Yes groups through the National Yes Registry along with the flags.

If we don't reach the target, we'll do the best that we can with the funds available and get as many flags, stickers and badges out as possible.

This time is for keeps. Lets do this.

story:
The Life-Changing Benefits of C-Rest

Relieving Neck Tension and Soreness; Remove Upper Body Stress;  Improve Your Posture; Increase Flexibility and Range of Motion; Mood Elevation and Mental Performance

 

 

The Revolutionary Intelligent Portable Neck Relaxer

If you suffer from tension in your neck, shoulders and upper back, then just 10 minutes with C-Rest will change your life! Specially developed by a doctor and chiropractor to be the most efficient neck massager available, C-Rest employs an incredible combination of acupressure, occipital muscle stimulation and cervical relaxation to instantly relieve your neck pain.

 

 

The Increasing Problem of Neck, Shoulder and Back Pain

Anybody that spends their days sitting at a desk or frequently uses a smartphone is extremely susceptible to ongoing stiffness and tension in their neck. These unnatural positions slowly deteriorate our posture, which puts unnecessary stress on our body.

Unfortunately, many of us have no choice but to continue on in this manner, only receiving occasional relief when we receive expensive massages or chiropractic care. Luckily…

 

Effortless Yet Extremely Effective Neck Relief

C-Rest’s beauty lies in its simplicity. Employing a powerful blend of strategically placed acupressure triggers, flexible yet strong spinal support and soothing back relaxers, C-Rest uses your own body weight and curvature to offer cervical stimulation and tension relief.

 

C-Rest is expertly designed to provide your next with unparalleled support by stabilizing the curvature of your spine, regaining your natural posture. By specifically targeting your neck extensor muscles, C-Rest is able to drastically reduce tension and soreness within just 10 minutes.

Unlike other neck massaging units, C-Rest does not require any batteries or electricity. Simply place the device under your neck as you lay down and its ergonomic support will naturally release trigger points to have you feeling revitalized instantly.

 

C-Rest Helps You Restore Your Natural Posture

Through its uniquely constructed design, your spine will stabilized and supported which will re-establish your body’s natural posture. This will lead to an increase in blood flow to your brain, neck muscles and shoulders, which instantly begins to reduce soreness while increasing the range of motion in your upper body.

Studies show that optimized posture is directly related to elevation in mood, concentration, metabolism, immune system and more, so the C-Rest’s ability to perfect your body’s curvature is doing much more than you can ever imagine!

 

Order C-Rest Now to See Why It Has Quickly Become The World’s Favorite Neck Massager

C-Rest quickly went from a concept created by a hairstylist and a doctor to an international sensation, raising over $750,000 on its Kickstarter campaign. Once the project was fully funded and orders began to ship, the positive reviews were overwhelming and it was clear that C-Rest had revolutionized the neck relief world!

If you are ready to make neck pain, tension and soreness a thing of the past in just 10 minutes, then you are ready to join the C-Rest revolution today!

 

 

Fully Portable and Easy to Transport

We understand that neck pain can occur anywhere and at anytime. That is why we developed C-Rest to be a fully portable neck massager that does not require any electricity. The lightweight yet durable design means that you can bring it with you to the office, the gym, while on vacation and use it in any room in your home.

All you need is a flat surface to lay down on or a chair to relax in, then you can reap all the extraordinary benefits of immediate pain relief and tension prevention that C-Rest provides!

 

 

All You Need is 10 Minutes Per Day with C-Rest

You can say goodbye to expensive massages, time consuming therapy and ineffective electric massagers by using C-Rest for just 10 minutes per day. That’s right! All you need to do is rest your head in C-Rest’s masterfully crafted curvature area and lay back for 10 minutes. Let the specially designed acupressure knobs, spinal support and upper back reinforcement do their work without you having to do anything more than slight head or neck movements. 

 The Life-Changing Benefits of C-Rest

Although neck tension and shoulder stiffness may seem like a minor annoyance, they impact your overall well-being and can create future problems if left unattended. C-Rest combats these issues by providing users with a wide variety of benefits which increase your overall physical and mental well-being.

● Relieving Neck Tension and Soreness: Never worry about suffering from the tension that comes with long days in front of a computer again, as C-Rest uses proven acupressure techniques that release knots in both neck and shoulders.

● Remove Upper Body Stress: When your spinal alignment is incorrect, your upper body is put under a lot of stress which can cause everything from pressure buildup to headaches to sinus congestion.

● Improve Your Posture: Many people have had their posture deteriorate due to unnatural movements such as using a smartphone or computer. C-Rest regains your natural spinal curvature so your body can rediscover its correct posture over time.

● Increase Flexibility and Range of Motion: As your neck and upper back stiffen, your mobility lessens. C-Rest increases blood flow to the region, allowing your muscles to warm, resulting in a dramatic increase in your range of motion.

● Mood Elevation and Mental Performance: When blood is freely flowing to your brain and your physical alignment is harmonized, your mental capacity and mood are optimized, resulting in better concentration, problem solving and creativity.

The lightweight yet durable design means that you can bring it with you to the office, the gym, while on vacation and use it in any room in your home.All you need is a flat surface to lay down on or a chair to relax in, then you can reap all the extraordinary benefits of immediate pain relief and tension prevention that C-Rest provides!  All You Need is 10 Minutes Per Day with C-RestYou can say goodbye to expensive massages, time consuming therapy and ineffective electric massagers by using C-Rest for just 10 minutes per day. That’s right! All you need to do is rest your head in C-Rest’s masterfully crafted curvature area and lay back for 10 minutes. Let the specially designed acupressure knobs, spinal support and upper back reinforcement do their work without you having to do anything more than slight head or neck movements.    The Life-Changing Benefits of C-RestAlthough neck tension and shoulder stiffness may seem like a minor annoyance, they impact your overall well-being and can create future problems if left unattended. C-Rest combats these issues by providing users with a wide variety of benefits which increase your overall physical and mental well-being.● Relieving Neck Tension and Soreness: Never worry about suffering from the tension that comes with long days in front of a computer again, as C-Rest uses proven acupressure techniques that release knots in both neck and shoulders.● Remove Upper Body Stress: When your spinal alignment is incorrect, your upper body is put under a lot of stress which can cause everything from pressure buildup to headaches to sinus congestion.● Improve Your Posture: Many people have had their posture deteriorate due to unnatural movements such as using a smartphone or computer. C-Rest regains your natural spinal curvature so your body can rediscover its correct posture over time.● Increase Flexibility and Range of Motion: As your neck and upper back stiffen, your mobility lessens. C-Rest increases blood flow to the region, allowing your muscles to warm, resulting in a dramatic increase in your range of motion.● Mood Elevation and Mental Performance: When blood is freely flowing to your brain and your physical alignment is harmonized, your mental capacity and mood are optimized, resulting in better concentration, problem solving and creativity.

story:
Julian is a really cute six year old.

He has craniosynostosis, and has had four neurosurgeries in his short little life, the last one being last September. 

Each of these surgeries comes with an astronomical price tag, and even with insurance, the bills are painful for our family.  We're still paying on surgery #2.

Well, in preparation for his last neurosurgery, they discovered a problem with his heart.  It seems his bicupsid valve and enlarged ventricle mean that he's also got some sort of stenosis of his aorta, and they need to surgically correct it.  The problem is that they need to correct it now...before Christmas. 

Pablo and I used up all our sick-leave and all our savings for the last surgery, and while we'll be able to make use of his FMLA and some unpaid leave for me, we simply don't have the money for our share of his admission...much less the babysitter if he can't go back to school on 1/6.  If you can share this around and help us out, it would be greatly, greatly appreciated.


Info will be up on http://cranio.julianantonio.com  Look specifically for the Heart surgery tab.

story:
Since 2010 the Tacoma Twilight Criterium has been an exiting day of amateur bike racing in the Tacoma Wa.  Origianlly held in downtown, the last 3 editions of the race have been in the historic Proctor District.   2012 & 13 saw the riders rounding corners past restaurants and local shops cheered on by crowds of local shoppers and spectators.  Due to city improvements on portions of the course, last years event was forced to move a couple of blocks away.  Although the racing was just as exciting their just wasn't the oppurtunity for the viewing public to enjoy it.   The 2015 edition hopes to return to the more spectator friendly portion of the neighborhood.   The Tacoma Twilight will this year be hosting the Washington State Bicycling Associations Masters State Championships.  Men and women riders from all over Washington and western Idaho will be competing for the title in 10 individual races plus the evenings elite men and women's races to finish the days event. 

     Here is where you can help make this happen.  In order for the course length to qualify for the championships we need to combine the two previous course's into one.   In doing so we also increase the cost of running the event.  Without your help we simply can't make this happen and will return to last years course.  With just a couple of dollars  you can help us.  No other sporting event offers the spectator the chance to be so close to the action as criterium bike racing.  Competitor's passing by at 30mph close enough for you to feel the wind they create.  The sound of their machines and their verbal chatter combine with the cheering and whistling crowd for an experience second to none.  All funds collected will go to the event with any additional funds collected going toward our next event.  

   So come on, be a small but significant part in this exciting day.  Check us out at www.tacomatwilight.com and share this with your friends.  Thanks for you support and we'll see you at the races!

story:
The Patent-Pending VerteCore Lift is an FDA-Cleared Device that is Ready to Be Manufactured and Shipped to People that Suffer from a Wide Variety of Lower Back Pain Conditions

VerteCore Lift: Offers Both Female, Male and Overweight Models

VerteCore Lift: Crowdfunding Campaign Mission

The purpose for this crowdfunding campaign is to raise enough money to pay for the first production run of 200 to 500 units. In return for supporting our campaign, we are willing to give our first wave of buyers a 50% discount, worth $300, for the VerteCore Lift that will soon retail for $599.  

We highly recommend that you buy the $389 VerteCore Lift Perk right now before the price goes up in the Fall of 2016. 

If money is a concern, then you can purchase our $195 Down Payment Perk, and you will not be billed for the final amount until the product is ready to be shipped to your doorstep. 

Check Out this 60-Second Product Video

VerteCore Lift: Ready for Manufacturing

Unlike many crowdfunding campaigns where the product is a 'Concept', undergoing product development and is raising money to build the first set of prototypes, our VerteCore Technologies "Lift" has already gone through years of product design and testing with leading chiropractors, medical doctors, orthopedists, neurosurgeons, and facilities that treat lower back pain, and is ready for the final step -- manufacturing and worldwide distribution.

The purchase decision making process should be easy. Have you spent more than $300 over the past 5 years trying to get rid of chronic back pain? If the answer is "yes," then you should definitely invest in a VerteCore Lift. 

It will be the BEST back pain investment you'll ever make to treat annoying, paralyzing, and agonizing chronic back pain!!!! 

VerteCore Lift: Satisfied Customer Testimonials

Everyone that has tried on one of our mobile, spinal decompression units has tried to buy one or more units before we left the premises. Why? Read through our "Lift Satisfied Customer Testimonials" from medical doctors and pain specialists who have evaluated this medical device and will tell you why they cannot wait to add it to their medical practice as soon as it becomes available.  

Want to Learn More? Watch these 3:00 Customer Testimonial Videos

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kjhYVxmULFw

VerteCore Lift: How Does It Work?

The VerteCore Lift is a very simple device to put on and manually decompress (lift or stretch) the spine, anywhere, anytime. It would have been nice to call this device a medical "Back Jack," but that trademark had already been registered. It does, however, work in a very similar manner to the way a car jack lifts up a car one click at a time when a car has a flat tire. The harness has two jacks, one on each side that can be jacked up until back pain relief is felt, usually in a matter of seconds. 

Vertebrae discs are also similar to a flat tire. As gravity, normal wear and tear or sports/work injuries cause the vertebrae to put too much pressure on vertebral discs, they sometimes begin to bulge or actually rupture just like a flat tire blow out. Just as a flat tire bulges out when it lays flat the ground, a ruptured disc bulges and puts pressure on the spinal cord nerve centers, which causes a wide variety of lower back pain. Similar to driving on the rim of a flat tire, it causes sparks and lots of friction. These sparks are what causes most types of lower back pain. 

When the VerteCore Lift "jacks up" or stretches out the spinal column, it allows the ruptured disc to heal itself just like sealing a flat tire and re-inflating it with air. Instead of allowing the grinding of adjacent vertebrae, discs, or nerves, this decompression process enables a natural healing as it separates the grinding elements, and reduces pressure being placed on spinal nerve roots. Relief is immediate and can be initiated by wearing the "Lift" for only 20-minutes a day during normal daily activities. 

How Spinal Decompression Treats Herniated Discs

 

 

 

VerteCore Lift: What Back Pain Does It Treat?

Bulging or Herniated Discs, Sciatica, Functional Scoliosis, S I Joint Disfunction, Stable Spondylolisthesis or Degenerative Disc Disease. If any of the above applies to you or a loved one, then this product was created to make your life better and give you immediate back pain relief! 

And unlike other back pain devices sold on TV that require laying down or hanging upside down, which causes blood to rush to your head, our VerteCore Lift is easy to put on and can be worn while running errands or even lite exercise, all at your own convenience - no doctor visits required.

Adding mobility to spinal decompression is a critical product development. Not only does it stretch out the spine allowing the vertebrae discs to return to their normal positions, but wearing it during activity increases the effectiveness of the body’s circulatory system which speeds ups the body’s ability to heal itself naturally.

 

VerteCore Lift: Product Timeline

 

 

 

VerteCore Lift: Lifetime Guarantee

We designed and built the VerteCore Lift to last a lifetime and we stand behind the quality and durability of our products. If your Lift ever breaks down, just ship it back. We'll either repair or replace it, and return it to you asap. It's our lifetime guarantee.

 

VerteCore Lift: Press Coverage

Would you like to write a story about the VerteCore Lift? Please review our online press kit materials:

 

  • Press Room 
  • Photographs
  • Videos
  • FAQ Sheet
  • Customer Testimonials
  • Press Coverage
  • Press Releases

VerteCore Lift: Fulfillment Center

We have signed an agreement with a leading fulfillment and distribution center, Brilliant Fulfillment, based in Carrolton, Texas. Once this crowdfunding campaign concludes Brilliant Fulfillment's call center will begin to accepting orders from back pain patients, medical professionals, spine treatment centers and medical device retailers and resellers at (888) 928-LIFT.

VerteCore Lift: Join Our Sales Team

Our next step is to build a nationwide sales team to begin a grass roots sales movement to sell the VerteCore Lift to lower back pain treatment facilities throughout the United States first, and then the rest of the world. Soon we will be seeking 20 sales reps in every state throughout the United States.

People who purchase one of the VerteCore Lift will receive not only immediate back pain relief, but have a chance to introduce this spinal decompression medical device to local chiropractors, medical doctors and spine treatment centers in their state. Once you try on your first VerteCore Lift, you will feel immediately why they will become best sellers.  If you haven't done so, Please Watch our Product Demonstration Videos to see for yourself!

VerteCore Lift: Why Will They Be Easy to Sell?

Right now there are only a few ways to treat lower back pain: exercise, pain medications, spinal traction and back surgery. Many people that have chronic back pain cease to be active and gain a lot weight. Therefore, exercising for many is simply not a option due to pain and excessive weight. 

Prescribing pain medication is also common, but America's addiction to pain medications is a growing epidemic. 

Spinal decompression medical equipment is very expensive, takes up a lot of space and it time consuming to operate. 

The last option is invasive back surgery, which doesn't always get rid of the back pain. 

The VerteCore Lift is small, lightweight and can be stored in most medicine cabinets. Yet, for its small foot print, it can yield substantial extra revenue for a medical practice by purchasing a single device. 

If a practitioner charges $100 per 20 minute session x 5 sessions per day x 20 business days per month, with a single VerteCore Lift, an M.D. or Chiropractor could add $10,000 per month/$120,000 per year in gross revenue to their medical practice.  

Not bad for a medical device that retails for only $599. And, at a sales price of $299, it would only take 3 patient visits to pay off the purchase price. And, for doctors with a large medical practice, purchasing the Doctor's Dozen Package Perk for $3,000 will generate a substantial Return on Investment or approximately an extra $1,440,000 in gross revenue per year.  

Hard to argue mathematically with investing $3,000 for 12 units that will pay themselves off with only 30 patient visits and then generate more than $1 million per year. Over a 10-year period, why not add an extra $10 million in revenue??

For people interested in adding the VerteCore Lift to your medical device sales portfolio, we have included a sales commission chart below that highlights the highly profitable sales margins that can be generated by selling just 100 units per month.  And yes, anyone that has a desire to sell them can earn this type of money by picking up the phone and scheduling appointments with local doctors and chiropractors. 

 

VerteCore Lift: Risks and Challenges

So, here is one major difference between us and a great number of Crowdfunding Campaigns... We have a finished product. It's not just an idea, concept, or even early prototype. The majority of challenges have already been overcome in the journey to today. There were quite a few. The great news is, by overcoming those challenges, we've also eliminated the majority of the risks. 

As previously mentioned, November(2016) was to be our first month for large quantity shipping; however, we will now begin shipping on a first purchased basis much sooner. Some early orders were already delivered in July and Early August. We will accelerate that schedule for all orders (large and small) as much as possible and hope to surprise everybody a little early. We can’t wait until everyone has the opportunity to have a Lift of their own. They are completely awesome!

 

We are confident that our team’s wide-ranging expertise in all relevant fields is extensive enough to address all the challenges.  In addition, we have established partnerships with leading specialists in all critical areas of product development. 

Our current team makes us feel very confident that we can handle any risks associated with production and continued development for future products. 

We will ship the first orders from our manufacturer to our backers as soon as possible, after all, we don't want you in pain any longer than necessary.

We will work diligently day and night to keep our promises and deliver all Lift's no later than November, but hopefully much sooner.

Our goal is to provide the best possible equipment in terms of quality, design, comfort, and safety. 
 

VerteCore Lift: Safety Guidelines

 

The VerteCore Lift  is an FDA,Class 1-cleared medical device. Class I devices present minimal potential harm to the user. Class I devices are typically simple in design, manufacture and have a history of safe use.

 

VerteCore Lift: Years of Product Testing

"Through years of testing and refinement, we have created the VerteCore Lift," said Paul Leake, VerteCore Technologies' Managing Director. "A practical solution for spinal decompression that not only helps relieve back pain, but can actually improve your back's health. The VerteCore Lift is portable, easy to use, self-administered, adjusts for different size users, provides instant relief, is doctor recommended, affordable, and best of all... it works!"  

 

VerteCore Lift Solves Back Pain and Is Mobile Enough to Enjoy Golf!

Do you have questions that have not been answered here?

We’d love to hear from you! Please email us at info@vertecorelift.com and we will respond as soon as we can. Supporters can also follow us at @VerteCore, like us on Facebook or connect with Paul Leake on LinkedIn. 

 

Thanks for Purchasing a Vertecore Lift™ and Sharing Our Back Pain Relief Story with Your Friends on Social Media!

story: My life-long friend is an anesthesiologist going on the first-ever obstetric fistula repair mission for international children's medical aid organization Operation Smile. Operation Smile provides surgery for children with correctable facial deformities such as cleft lips, cleft palates, facial tumors and burns. This mission – happening in Lubumbashi, the second-largest city in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC), March 16-30, 2015 – is a pilot program for Operation Smile, with an ultimate goal of establishing a full-time care center for women with obstetric fistulas in the DRC. The money would go to purchase spinal anesthesia needles. I am donating the first $100.
story_txt: My life-long friend is an anesthesiologist going on the first-ever obstetric fistula repair mission for international children's medical aid organization Operation Smile. story:
Short Summary

  • Hello everyone my name is Travis Hamlin, I am thirty one years old and live in Bakersfield CA. Proudly, I am engaged to an all around beautiful woman, who has blessed me with an amazing daughter. I have the best mother a guy could ask for and two older sisters whom I love dearly.Being a family man, I have mostly worked with and for my father until his death in 2008. Recently I have been working for a furniture company and have been a top writer in sales. This new job requires me to work weekends, holidays and just about all the time. Working for someone else has been a great opportunity but doesn't give me much family time. So for the past four years I have been working with my cousin to try and build a better career working for ourselves and carry on a new family business.
  • VentSense has been a ongoing project for the last four years of my life. I have spent every extra dollar and spent every extra minute of the day working on this project. I've brought in family and friends who also truly believe in this product and have put in their all as well. VentSense to us means working with the people who matter most, your family. Nothing gives me a greater feeling than to provide for the ones I love and to know they are taken care of. VentSense is also an eco-friendly product, using no additional electricity, flames or aerosols to scent your home.
  • Achieving this goal with the help of all our supporters and Indiegogo, would help a product that not only is useful but also helps the environment. Every day millions of household air fresheners are being used without any thought of the resulting environmental or health impacts. VentSense utilizes what every home or office already has; air vents. I realize we are not going to completely stop the use of our competitors’ products, our goal is to replace as many of these harmful products as we can. With your help I truly believe we can make a large impact on the air freshener industry and the way we all freshen our homes.

What We Need & What You Get

  • VentSense is a patent pending product, the logo is registered and we have our website up and running. We have done the research and product development, started a marketing campaign and partnered with likeminded individuals to see this product through. Our manufacturer is ready to start our first production run of 25,000 units. We have one small problem, the $50,000 that we need to begin production. With your help we can keep this project moving full speed ahead and bring this product to the masses.
  • We feel the best way to raise this money is to give you the supporters what you really want, the product itself. There are a few smaller perks of course, but a majority will include at least a 3 pack of one of our fresh scents mailed directly to your home. Each VentSense air freshener will give you up to 30 days of freshness, thats a total of 90 days of fresh scented air.
  • $50,000 is our goal, but there is the chance we may not reach that goal. Any of the funds collected from this campaign will go straight to our manufacturer to purchase the amount needed to fufill the perks from our supporters. We can get the word out through you and our marketing team. With enough support we can sell our product on our website. Once we are up and running all profits will go toward making this product even more environmentally friendly.

The Impact

  • We feel even though we don't have the "coolest" project around, there are enough forward thinking individuals who will appreciate the convenience and environmental benefits of this project. Let's face it, there are some major issues with air freshener products currently on the market:
  • Paraffin candles account for 90% of all candle sales. Paraffin is derived from crude oil which generates a substantial eco-footprint.
  • Plugins; using a minimal figure of twenty million units, being used for one year, results in a total energy usage equal to1/8 the output of a 500 megawatt coal-fired power plant or 612,000 barrels of oil.
  • In 2008, Anne Steinman at the University of Washington published a study of top selling air fresheners. She found that all products tested gave off chemicals regulated as toxic or hazardous under federal laws, including carcinogens with no safe exposure level.

Other ways you can help

  • Tell your friends, family, co works and anyone you can. Even if you personally do not donate at least help us spread the word and make some noise people!
  • Like us on Facebook, send us a friend request, we would absolutely love to get feedback from the consumers. Look for "VentSense"
  • Visit our website www.ventsense.com
  • Go to our YouTube link and leave comments on our videos so that we can improve on the next one.
story_txt:
Short Summary

Hello everyone my name is Travis Hamlin, I am thirty one years old and live in Bakersfield CA. Proudly, I am engaged to an all around beautiful woman, who has blessed me with an amazing daughter. I have the best mother a guy could ask for and two older sisters whom I love dearly.Being a family man, I have mostly worked with and for my father until his death in 2008. Recently I have been working for a furniture company and have been a top writer in sales. This new job requires me to work weekends, holidays and just about all the time. Working for someone else has been a great opportunity but doesn't give me much family time. So for the past four years I have been working with my cousin to try and build a better career working for ourselves and carry on a new family business.


VentSense has been a ongoing project for the last four years of my life. I have spent every extra dollar and spent every extra minute of the day working on this project. I've brought in family and friends who also truly believe in this product and have put in their all as well. VentSense to us means working with the people who matter most, your family. Nothing gives me a greater feeling than to provide for the ones I love and to know they are taken care of. VentSense is also an eco-friendly product, using no additional electricity, flames or aerosols to scent your home.
Achieving this goal with the help of all our supporters and Indiegogo, would help a product that not only is useful but also helps the environment. Every day millions of household air fresheners are being used without any thought of the resulting environmental or health impacts. VentSense utilizes what every home or office already has; air vents. I realize we are not going to completely stop the use of our competitors’ products, our goal is to replace as many of these harmful products as we can. With your help I truly believe we can make a large impact on the air freshener industry and the way we all freshen our homes.

What We Need & What You Get

VentSense is a patent pending product, the logo is registered and we have our website up and running. We have done the research and product development, started a marketing campaign and partnered with likeminded individuals to see this product through. Our manufacturer is ready to start our first production run of 25,000 units. We have one small problem, the $50,000 that we need to begin production. With your help we can keep this project moving full speed ahead and bring this product to the masses.
We feel the best way to raise this money is to give you the supporters what you really want, the product itself. There are a few smaller perks of course, but a majority will include at least a 3 pack of one of our fresh scents mailed directly to your home. Each VentSense air freshener will give you up to 30 days of freshness, thats a total of 90 days of fresh scented air.
$50,000 is our goal, but there is the chance we may not reach that goal. Any of the funds collected from this campaign will go straight to our manufacturer to purchase the amount needed to fufill the perks from our supporters. We can get the word out through you and our marketing team. With enough support we can sell our product on our website. Once we are up and running all profits will go toward making this product even more environmentally friendly.

The Impact

We feel even though we don't have the "coolest" project around, there are enough forward thinking individuals who will appreciate the convenience and environmental benefits of this project. Let's face it, there are some major issues with air freshener products currently on the market:
Paraffin candles account for 90% of all candle sales. Paraffin is derived from crude oil which generates a substantial eco-footprint.
Plugins; using a minimal figure of twenty million units, being used for one year, results in a total energy usage equal to1/8 the output of a 500 megawatt coal-fired power plant or 612,000 barrels of oil.
In 2008, Anne Steinman at the University of Washington published a study of top selling air fresheners. She found that all products tested gave off chemicals regulated as toxic or hazardous under federal laws, including carcinogens with no safe exposure level.

Other ways you can help

Tell your friends, family, co works and anyone you can. Even if you personally do not donate at least help us spread the word and make some noise people!
Like us on Facebook, send us a friend request, we would absolutely love to get feedback from the consumers. Look for "VentSense"
Visit our website www.ventsense.com

Go to our YouTube link and leave comments on our videos so that we can improve on the next one.

story:
Our good friend Christine Kaufmann put it eloquently: “Cancer is one expensive b*tch.”  Kaufmann has been bravely battling breast cancer since this past June with her trademark strength, tenacity, and humor.

Since long before the expensive (and all too common*) breast cancer came along, Kaufmann has been a die-hard Yankees fan as a season ticketholder for the past 14 years.  This year, however, paying for her treatment has trumped paying for her tickets, and she has made the difficult decision to skip her annual Yankees purchase.

As her friends, family, colleagues, classmates, and stranger-friends, we don't think Kaufmann should have to skip the Yankees while she kicks cancer to the curb.  In fact, we suspect going to the games like she has every other year for a decade and a half will probably help her win this fight.

Please consider donating to Save Kaufmann’s Yankee tickets. Any amount is greatly appreciated and please spread the word!


*1 in 8 US women will develop breast cancer during their lifetime.

 Source: Cancer.org

story:
The Impact 

Hey guys, thanks for taking the time! 

Welcome to my quest to raise money for top surgery – also known in the world as a whole slew of things like double mastectomy, gender reassignment surgery, the big chop, etc., etc. 

But let’s start with a little background info, shall we? I, like most people, have had many relationships with my body over the years. I’ve worked super hard to change the things I can change (some of which I talk about on my extremely awesome blog, mandatainstalling.tumblr.com), and have worked even harder to come to terms with the stuff I can’t. Recently, I’ve been working on realizing that there are some things I can't change on my own, but may actually be able to change with some help. I’ve taken the first step with this – starting testosterone injections (imma be a bear! rawr!). The next step, the harder one to access, is the one change I have wanted consistently since I was very small – no more boobs. On me, that is (other peoples' are great!). I feel like my body has always been in agreement with me on this, as it has given me 15+ years of posture/sports bra/muscle development-related chronic back pain to hammer the point home.

All sounds clear so far, yeah? To summarize the problem: gender and pain-related desire to free myself of these fleshy sacks. Solution? Ftm top surgery. 

And so we come to the crux of the issue: m-o-n-e-y. Yes, I live in Canada, the land of the health care, which we gloatingly hold over the heads of Americans. And yes, it is an accessible thing here for some people to get ftm top surgery covered by the government – but only for some, and only after going through an often ridiculously-demoralizing and quite (years) long process of fitting into very specific ideas of what a ‘man’ is. 

Which brings me to another thing I should mention. A super happy thing (that a lot of you know about already) – I’m getting married next year! HURRAY! On May 21st, 2014 I will be entering yet another new phase of life, a government recognized relationship status! What an eye-opening thing, getting engaged. I’m not someone who held a lot of stake in getting legally married, but I won’t lie, it all changes when you find someone you wanna do it with. And then you starting thinking about all of these things, like who you want to be when standing across the altar from someone. For me, a big part of that is being a boobless person. 

What I Need & What You Get 

All this to say (beyond feeling like this is the time to make the changes I want in life), I don’t have 2+ years to wait for the powers that be to decide that I’m sufficiently ‘man enough’ to deserve government help in accessing top surgery. 

I’m generally not very good at asking for help. I’ve gone through unhealthily long periods of time holding onto my emotional and physical malnourishment because my pride has prevented me from asking for what I need. I’ve also waited many years to start making these changes, for that same reason. But here I am, changing my ways, being a new me (that alter-worthy person, and a person beyond that as well) who is willing to ask for help when I need it. And, friends, I need your help. 

So my quest – raise $8000 bucks. The breakdown of which is: 

Doctor’s fee for surgery: $6500
Taxes: $845
Indiegogo fee: $293.80 - 661.05
Total: $8006.05

Now, I don’t expect you to just give me money with nothing in return. One upside of my excessive pride is that it has lead me to try to be super self-sufficient, which means another good thing – while I might not have money, I HAVE SKILLS! Lots of them. All of which I am super excited about offering up for much less than I usually do in hopes of making it a little easier for you help me out! What are some of those skills? Glad you asked...

For one, I’m pretty adept with a camera – hell, it’s what I do for a living. So, do you need some new head shots? Got it covered. Wanna surprise someone special with a dirty magazine staring you (the holidays are coming!)? I can do that too. Fan of the moving image? Yep. But my skills don’t stop there, I have a pretty hefty arsenal of graphic design and website building magic too. Do you need a new online identity? Website? Branding? Yep yep yep. I also make art, which will be available for those of you who don’t wanna think of something else to do on your own. AND for those of you who are like me and may be struggling financially but still want to help (appreciated!), I will be making man_data installing apparel – t-shirt & tank tops, screen printed by me! There are many ways to help out and to also get something awesome for yourself (no need for altruism here, although it won’t be rejected). Check out the list for all the different ways, big or small, in which I can help you acquire something cool and relevant in exchange for you helping me complete this quest. 

Also worth noting: it’s my birthday at the end of January, which is conveniently (or totally intentionally) close to when this campaign will end. What a bday present! 

Other Ways You Can Help 

I know money’s a hard thing for many of us, and there are a lot of other currencies in the world. If you wanna help in ways that aren’t financial, consider sharing this around to folks – it helps a ton! And, conveniently, Indiegogo has a lot of built-in share tools for you to use in order to do just that!

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Anat Volfovich, and I'm a lawyer from Tel-Aviv, Israel. 
  • I met Ola over 10 years ago through Noa, Ola's "sister" and a dear friend of mine.  
  • Ola was born to neglectful abusive parents. When she was only 3 years old, her father gave her toxic acid to drink causing permanent damage to her digestive system and other vital organs. 
  • Since then, Ola grew up in several foster homes, and spent years in and out of hospitals.
  • Ola needs to undergo a life saving operation in the USA to reconstruct her digestive system, which will enable her to eat and drink properly. 

What We Need 

  • Ola's operation, hospitalization and rehabilitation process is expected to be long and expensive. The costs are estimated at about $750,000.
  • We raised approximately $350,000 through "Kav Lachayim", an Israeli non-profit; however, we have a long way to reach our goal...
  • The funds raised through this campaign will be used exclusivly to pay for Ola's operation, hospitalization and rehabilitation expanses. 
  • Help us save Ola's life! 

Other Ways You Can Donate

  • Donations can also be made through "Kav Lachayim" bank account - 
    • Iban: IL22-0125-3200-0000-0492-218; Account name: AMOTAT KAV LECHAYIM; Swift code: POALILIT.
  • U.S. tax deductible donations of at least $25 may be sent to P.E.F. Israel Endowment Funds, Inc., 317 Madison Avenue, Suite 607, New York, NY 10017 with a recommendation that it be used for kavlachayim – Ola Azimov.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please spread the word out and help us bring this campaign to as many people as possible - Sharing is caring! 
  • Thank you for your time and support.

story:
Kids Want Style...You Want Safety. You Both Win!

limited quantities at $129...plus 6 months free service!

Parents' greatest fear is losing their children. And that fear is at its peak in crowded locations. So we created kidsport GPS! It's a stylish and cool sports band that will allow you to locate your kids at the touch of a button on your phone, iPad or computer. Kids love the style, parents love the safety!


UPDATE: New Program for Kids with Autism

Now you can donate a band to a kid with Autism through the Autism Society-the Heartland. See program details below.

The Band

kidsport GPS not only looks cool, but there's a ton of technology wrapped up inside this hip little sports band. And that's the "secret sauce"...no wearable product has so much packed into so little space. 


PRE-ORDER HERE >>>>>>>

kidsport GPS Features

  • Comfort: The band is made of soft and comfortable silicone, much like the feel of bands the kids are used to wearing. And don't worry, they are latex-free.
  • Three sizes: Little Kid (110 mm-133 mm), Big Kid (134 mm-150 mm) and Biggest Kid (151 mm-170 mm)
  • Waterproof: Go ahead! Jump in the pool or ocean and have fun! 
  • Durable: Let the kids have a blast and don't worry about them beating on the band...we got it!


Cool Safety Features

  • Alert Button: If your kid needs you, they simply press an Alert Button on the band to send you an immediate text.
  • Secure Latch: Taking the band off is easy for parents; it's NOT easy for somebody who shouldn't be removing the band.
  • Removal Alert: When the band is taken off, you'll receive an alert letting you know.

The Technology

  • Wireless Module: World's smallest cell phone module with extremely low power consumption. 
  • GPS Module: Ability to track location as accurately as 3 meters.
  • Custom Antennas: Highly sensitive cell and GPS antennas, custom designed for maximum performance. 
  • Rechargeable Battery: High-powered Lithium polymer battery insures long life throughout an active day of fun!
  • USB Charger: Just plug it to a wall or computer USB slot, just like your phone.


The technology in the band is much like a cell phone and sends location data in two ways: on on a set time schedule (for example, every 10 minutes) and ON-DEMAND. When you hit the location refresh button on the app, it sends a signal through the cell chip in the band. The band then sends the location through the cell chip back to the app. A lot gets done in a very short period of time.

The Apps

Our web, iPhone and Android apps are awesome!

Mobile App

  • Step 1: Create your family account online and load up kid's names.


  • Step 2: Download the iPhone or Android App. 
  • Step 3: Upload your most fun kid picture and let the fun begin.


Web App

3D imagery and even street-view will allow you to zoom right down to your kid's location from you laptop or iPad. And HEY, welcome to our kidsport GPS office below! It's good to have you!


Amazingly Cool Stress-Reducing App Features

  • Works on iPhone, Android, Computer or iPad.
  • Upload your most FUN kid picture to the app...or take a new one.
  • See the exact date, time and address of your kid's location.
  • Alert by text when kids goes outside the SAFE GEO-FENCE you set for them.
  • Alert by text when kid enters the GEO-FENCE you set.
  • Alert by text when your kid holds down his/her alert button.
  • Alert by text when band is taken off. 

HELPING KIDS WITH AUTISM 

Similar to wandering behaviors in seniors with dementia or Alzheimer's, children with Autism are prone to wandering away from a safe environment. Unfortunately, many cases end in tragedy.* 

In coordination with the Autism Society of the Heartland, you can donate kidsport GPS bands to kids with Autism. You buy the band; we donate it to the Autism Society-the Heartland. You will get a thank you letter and a picture of the kid that received your band. If you want it to go to a kid you know, we will make sure that kid gets one. If you want it go to a kid in your area, our local chapter will work with your chapter to get the band to a kid in your area. Just pick one the Autism Society Perks to the right for $129, $500, or $1,000. There are corporate options available as well. And, it's all tax deductible. 


*Source: Autism Wandering Awareness Alerts Response and Education (AWAARE) Collaboration

The Team

The kidsport GPS team includes the Sullivan, Hicks and Long families, plus a bunch of amazing technology partners who helped us make our product dreams come true! We have partnered with the global leaders in cell and location module technology and our team is not only handsome...but crazy smart too! Our company is based on one word...FUN. Our goal is to create a resume of amazing memories and hope to help other families do the same.


Why Indiegogo?

We may have a cool product, but we aren't made of money! In fact, we have gone ALL IN. But now we need your help. We spent the last two years developing the technology and design of kidsport GPS, and now we are ready for production. But we need more funds to produce the band at a price all families can afford. By pre-ordering your kidsport GPS today at a reduced price, you can help us create stress-free fun for you and your family. And help our dream of creating stress-free fun become a reality.

FAQ

  • Are there monthly charges for band? Yes, the fee is $10 a month.  Of course there's some taxes and fees on top of that, but we don't anticipate that being more than a couple bucks. And you can turn your service off at any time. No contracts to worry about!
  • How long will the battery last? It will last between 24-48 hours based on usage. It's much like a cell phone.
  • Are there different sizes? Three sizes: Little Kid (110 mm-133 mm), Big Kid (134 mm-150 mm) and Biggest Kid (151 mm-170 mm)
  • How do I charge kidsport GPS? Simply plug the USB connector into any USB port, which means your wall charger or laptop work great.
  • Does kidsport GPS work internationally? Yes, our location chip uses GPS, GLONASS and SBAS satellite signals, and will work in over 115 countries worldwide.
  • How do alerts appear on my device? When your kid holds down the alert button for three seconds, you will immediately receive a text alert. Also, if your kid goes outside the geo-fence that you created online or on your app, you will receive a text letting you know. You will also receive a text once they enter a geo-fence area...so you know they got back to where they are supposed to be.
  • Is my kidsport GPS waterproof? Yes...because it's designed to be worn in FUN places...like the beach or pool.

Media
